string.text: We're having equipment problems, connection with the base and squads might be glitchy for a couple of days.
Don't clog the airwaves, nobody is interested in your exploits killing random guys.
Switch to the private channel, download the security update. If there is an information leak because you were too lazy to patch - I'll strangle you.
Information regarding raids on mutants and other operations - to the private channel. We don't need a leak on top of everything else.
Stalkers, join "Duty". We will protect the planet from the Zone's infection!
Experienced stalkers needed for a raid on Snorks. Payment is appropriate.
Experienced stalkers needed for a raid on mutants. Payment is appropriate.
Experienced stalkers needed for a raid on mutant spawn. Payment is appropriate.
Petrenko, answer me, dammit! What is going on with your private channel?! Is it down again?!
This is Petrenko. We have temporary interruptions in the private channel operation, if anything happens - PM me.
Voronin speaking. All squads, report in immediately! General assembly on the channel!
Petrenko speaking. I repeat, passage to the base is strictly by pass or my order.
This is Petrenko. 3rd Squad, where is the data on the recon raid? Report if there are casualties in the squad! And what the hell is wrong with your comms?!
This is Zheka Starosta. Squad commanders, report to Gen. Voronin for briefing!!
This is Prapor. Attention all! Issuance of equipment and ammunition is at the specified hours! Do I have to sleep here or what?!!
This is Petrenko. 5th Squad! Nobody cancelled the raid for Arena monsters! Get out of the bar now! Do you want to go to the anarchists?!

This is Petrenko. For squads one through four! I repeat, only for squads one through four! Square thirteen, snail nine, map six - is closed until seventeen hundred hours tomorrow. High mutant activity expected.
Long live "Freedom"! We'll make the world better with the help of the Zone!
Join "Freedom"! Let's stop the Zone's takeover!
Experienced stalkers needed for an artifact raid. Treats are on us.
Loners! "Freedom" speaking! If you want to live in normal conditions in the Zone and without army obligations like in "Duty" - move to us! Always glad to see new faces.
All our guys - urgently log into the private channel, we are updating security. Don't complain later that "Duty" found out about your raid.
If you are on a mission, all info goes to the private channel. Not only our guys read this one, don't blow your cover.
Send data on merc movements immediately to my private chat, this is really important.
Dudes! Imagine, the grass near the Springboard - hits hard! Ha-ha-ha!!!
Lukash! We've been waiting for the Barrier relief shift for three days! We're sick of this...
This is Skryaga. I got hold of some toilet paper, whoever is tired of burdocks - run here fast, the batch is limited.
The Barrier relief shift is late again! What kind of negligence is this! I'm not going to fry my brains here!
This is the expeditionary group! We are in heavy combat with superior enemy forces. Equipment partially destroyed. Requesting reinforcements!
Max! We're burned! Let's get out of here!
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]A pair of helicopters just passed over me heading north. Coordinates attached. Let's keep our heads down, I don't know what their orders are.
%c[orange]Squad:\n%c[default]We are moving by bearing to the helicopter that crashed in the swamps. No one so far.
%c[orange]Squad:\n%c[default]Observing a mutant wave, coming from the northwest, see attached coordinates.
%c[orange]Squad:\n%c[default]Observing a mutant wave, coming from the northern ravine.
%c[orange]Squad:\n%c[default]Observing a mutant wave. Coming from the east. Presumably, from the Dark Valley.
%c[orange]ID not registered in system:\n%c[default]Mayday, a pack of dogs is coming straight at us, exact coordinates attached!
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]Marauders, bastards... They destroyed all of Pripyat, it's a pity... I grew up there.
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]A pseudodog attacked, barely shot it!
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]Saw a group of some random guys, presumably Freedom, heading towards the Bar.
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]A group of five people is moving towards the Barrier, presumably Monolith. Take measures.
%c[orange]Source unidentified:\n%c[default]Mayday, the military pinned us down at Agroprom in the central complex!
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]Lukash, the mercs are shot, we are going home.
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]Two-three-seven, coming home, meet us.
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]Marauders pinned me down, help!
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]Heard military comms, they are planning some operation at Yantar.
%c[orange]Drunk Programmer:\n%c[default]Need internet access. Is there any in the bar, or do I have to drag myself to Sidorovich?
%c[orange]Sidorovich:\n%c[default]It is dangerous to live and be a trader nowadays, need people for security. For me and my savings!

%c[orange]Barkeep:\n%c[default]I want to remind everyone again: whoever finds old music recordings on any media, bring them to me! I don't promise money, but we will play what you bring. If quality allows.
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]Need a stalker, specialist in combination locks, with experience raiding the north of the Zone.
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]Vasily! Give back the guitar, you bastard!
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]Don't play cards with Bilba - he cheats.
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]who has "tetris" - let me play for a couple of days...
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]Was at the Warehouses, found a medal for courage, a whole box, who were they going to award them to?
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]I heard the Americans sent one of their supermen to us. Will be interesting to look at him.
%c[orange]Source unidentified:\n%c[default] Don't go into the basements, they are full of creatures! Go around on top!
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]Hemul, blow to the bar urgently, I have business!
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]People! Be careful in the village at the warehouses - there's Burnt Fuzz drifted onto the posts!
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]Hello, heroes, dammit! Stop trying to kick us out of the ATP! If any scumbag hasn't realized yet - this is our territory and don't fuck with us!
%c[orange]Source unidentified:\n%c[default]Damn! Holy cow, it's full of zombies at Yantar again! Be careful there, people!

%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]Stalkers! Sakharov gives good money for loot! And keeps looking for someone to send to the factory there... I'm not risking it... It's highly radioactive there, plus zombies...
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]Attention! If in the village in the Dark Valley they offer you to buy some fancy rifle for 800 rubles - don't believe it, it's a scam!
%c[orange]Baldy:\n%c[default]Bandits have appeared in the Dark Valley again. Not good. We will be eradicating them.
%c[orange]Baldy:\n%c[default]Sponge Gop, sweatpants. If you see him - shoot him.
%c[orange]Mole:\n%c[default]Recruiting people for a raid into the catacombs.
%c[orange]Mole:\n%c[default]Need two stalkers for a raid into the catacombs.
%c[orange]Mole:\n%c[default]Recruiting people for a raid into the catacombs.
%c[orange]Fanatic:\n%c[default]Wolf, respond, need to talk. How many times do I have to repeat? Where did you disappear to?
%c[orange]Barkeep:\n%c[default]So... explaining once and for all - I will not say where the communication center is located.
%c[orange]Fanatic:\n%c[default]Wolf, respond, need to talk.
%c[orange]Petrenko:\n%c[default]I repeat, passage to the "Duty" base - strictly by pass or my order.
%c[orange]Sakharov:\n%c[default]A personal request from me: if anyone is near my shelter and is not short on ammo, please, kill the Snorks in the swamps - they make my life miserable!
%c[orange]Rafyk:\n%c[default]We solve your problems with competitors. Expensive. Ask Ara, yes? We'll be near the Bar.
%c[orange]Rafyk:\n%c[default]Hey, who was blabbering about me in the Bar? I find out - I stab, yes?
%c[orange]Ivan Scikun:\n%c[default]Heard the news: someone wants to break through to the Scorcher again. Scary!
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]They say Sakharov has new detectors!
%c[orange]Andriy Patriot:\n%c[default]Wow, damn, so many Muscovites arrived
%c[orange]Yarik Rooster:\n%c[default]Some random loser is wandering in the Dark Valley. But his gun is cool. If anyone loots him - I'll buy that gun.

%c[orange]bacha:\n%c[default]Today, at 2 AM, a Zaporozhets was stolen from the bridges towards the bar (from the garbage side). Color - rust with milk, no doors or trunk lid. Around 1 AM a controller was hanging around the Zaz (wearing only torn pants), complaining for a long time that nobody needs my wreck. If anyone saw this scum - report it. Reward guaranteed.
%c[orange]bacha:\n%c[default]At the Warehouses, where the mercenary outpost is, a corpse went missing. Killed four, but there are three bodies. Devices show three too. Did anyone take it?
%c[orange]bacha:\n%c[default]Barkeep, motherfucker, charged 60 grand plus for repairing the suit and didn't finish fixing it, had to pay another 40. That's not according to the code.
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]Guys, help out! Dark Valley! Thugs pinned me down! Help, whoever is nearby!
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]Doctors! Who has seen the Swamp Doctor? I am in the swamps. I feel bad...
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]What the hell is happening to me? Skin is peeling off... Hair falling out...
%c[orange]ID not registered in system:\n%c[default]M-m-m-m-m... KI-I-I-ILL!!!..
%c[orange]ID not registered in system:\n%c[default]K... K... CRU-U-U-USH!!!..
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]Goodbye, my right leg... Goodbye, everyone who knew me... Hello, bloodsucker spawn!
%c[orange]ID not registered in system:\n%c[default]Hr-r-r... d-d-d-d-d... ooo-o-o-o-o... HEL......P SOMEBO......DY!..
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]MAYDAY! MAYDAY! A mutant wave is coming right at us! Whoever is close - help! We can't handle it alone!
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]People! Does anyone know when the next Blowout is?
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]Who knows - is the next Blowout soon?
%c[orange]Zhora Joint:\n%c[default]Guys! A batch of dope has arrived. Whoever needs it - paddle over.
%c[orange]Hidden:\n%c[default]Guys! What is this leftist propaganda on the channel? Where is it coming from?

%c[orange]ID not registered in system:\n%c[default]Do you still think you are right? Look around! You like this, don't you?! You found yourself here?! So why do you say the Zone is a punishment, a penalty to humanity... Do you suffer when others get pleasure? Feel injustice? Want to change the world for the better? But maybe you have changed yourself? You are so used to pain that you became its messenger in the world...

%c[orange]ID not registered in system:\n%c[default]Everything has its term. Look back - there is emptiness. Look into the distance - there is horror and death. Why feel and see this? After all, you just need to change yourself, start feeling goodness from the Zone, so that all this stops...
%c[orange]ID not registered in system:\n%c[default]Are you afraid for your life? The Zone can give advice, help...

%c[orange]ID not registered in system:\n%c[default]Only the worthy will receive happiness! YOU think Blowouts are death to all living things? We know how to turn it to our advantage! Become worthy! Receive happiness!

%c[orange]ID not registered in system:\n%c[default]Is the Zone not freedom? Is it not beautiful here? Do you not want to die here? We will help You become a friend of the Zone, learn to benefit from it!

%c[orange]ID not registered in system:\n%c[default]The Zone is growing... You don't believe it? Look around! Don't you see? It is already inside you! Why go against yourself? Become its friend, not an enemy!

%c[orange]ID not registered in system:\n%c[default]Everything is decaying... Are you not glad about this? You live here, which means you only accelerate the decay. Run from the Zone or become its guide to the rest of the lost world! Only the Zone gives truth! You won't get truth from its pathetic semblance...
%c[orange]ID not registered in system:\n%c[default]You are drawn to HIM... But you are rude, deceitful, selfish! You are unworthy of HIM! Only humility and obedience will give you what you want!
%c[orange]ID not registered in system:\n%c[default]HE knows everything! Infidels will die! HIS voice leads us to victory!
%c[orange]ID not registered in system:\n%c[default]What you seek, HE knows. You think you are worthy? Only the faithful will receive happiness...
%c[orange]ID not registered in system:\n%c[default]Life for HIS sake is the least I can give! Tremble infidels! For we are coming to cleanse the world!
%c[orange]ID not registered in system:\n%c[default]Brothers! We are one! We are HIS sons! Let there be happiness for everyone and let no one be offended!
%c[blue]Deathdoor:\n%c[default]Looking for a sensible modeler, with experience in Max or Maya. Those interested - knock in PM, we'll discuss details at the meeting.
%c[blue]Dusty79:\n%c[default]Using plugins on the channel is forbidden! Nobody cares what music you are listening to right now and what mood you are in.
%c[blue]kamikaZze:\n%c[default]What infection tried to hack the comms server again?! I find you - I'll personally separate your head from your body!
%c[blue]Metroid:\n%c[default]Don't be like the idiots screaming in the general channel for any reason. I'll take care of them.

%c[blue]FEAR93:\n%c[default]Attention all exoskeleton owners! A bug found in the right manipulator coprocessor drivers! Come to me in PM for a patch! Bazil Whistler, Vovka Kutsiy and Lekha Angela Davis can smoke calmly on the sidelines â€“ I changed your firmware recently, everything is normal there!

%c[blue]kamikaZze:\n%c[default]TO EVERYONE! At the Wild Territory took a PDA off a dead stalker from a bandit. Filled with unsent "Maydays" due to network overload. Sorry for the guy. People, don't clog the airwaves with garbage, you might end up in his place. To the especially dense ones I will block the PDA. Sidor, Barkeep and Four-eyes are also aware - they won't help.
%c[orange]"Duty"\n%c[default]Stalkers! The number of zombies at Yantar increases every day, we can't cope! Join our ranks - let's protect our native science!
%c[orange]"Duty"\n%c[default]Stalkers! The number of zombies at Yantar increases every day, we can't cope! Join our ranks - let's protect our native science!
%c[orange]"Duty"\n%c[default]Alright, Freedomers, dammit! If you stoned idiots think about putting boar manure in our stashes again - we'll hang you by your feet!

%c[orange]"Duty"\n%c[default]Attention all squads located in square H-23 or nearby! Immediately confirm the presence of particularly dangerous mutants in this region! Information came from an unverified source.

%c[orange]"Duty"\n%c[default]Squad commanders, from unofficial sources it became known that the so-called Death Truck appeared on the Cordon again. Moreover, it became known that survivors were found in it. Whoever is closer - pay a visit there, check what's what, it's a suspicious matter.
%c[orange]Zheka Starosta\n%c[default]Squad commanders must urgently arrive for briefing to General Voronin!

%c[orange]"Duty"\n%c[default]Who knows where to get old Soviet radio stations and is willing to share this information - approach Colonel Petrenko. Such means of radio communication are needed to link checkpoints with the main base. New models don't work long in the Zone and only at very short distances. But old Soviet tech is just what we need. And remember: "Duty" pays its debts!
%c[orange]Skull\n%c[default]Base, come in, Cherepanov speaking. We have casualties, I repeat, we have casualties. Vasily got hit, Mikhalchenko is barely breathing. Transmitting coordinates.
%c[orange]"Duty"\n%c[default]Serious warning! Snorks spotted at the Wild Territory, not far from the western gate. Why did they leave the swamp... Brothers, arm yourselves better!
%c[orange]"Duty"\n%c[default]Don't clog the airwaves, nobody is interested in your exploits killing random guys.
%c[orange]"Duty"\n%c[default]Switch to the private channel, download the security update. If there is an information leak because you were too lazy to patch - I'll strangle you.
%c[orange]"Duty"\n%c[default]Looking for a skilled anti-sniper group to destroy the enemy in the Unexplored Land. Those interested approach Colonel Petrenko. Good reward guaranteed!
%c[orange]"Duty"\n%c[default]Information on special operations - to the private channel. We don't need a leak on top of everything else.
%c[orange]"Duty"\n%c[default]Stalkers, join "Duty". We will protect the planet from the Zone's infection!

%c[orange]"Duty"\n%c[default]Stalker! Life gives you the opportunity to find loyal comrades in the ranks of "Duty"! Only here will you find those who will cover your back and share the last piece of bread!

%c[orange]"Duty"\n%c[default]According to our data, in the new open territories - Zaton and the Jupiter surroundings, there is a huge breeding ground for mutants. Appearances of unclassified objects are possible. A massive cleanup will be carried out soon, using heavy weapons, armored vehicles, and helicopters, with military support. It is not recommended to visit these territories before the start and during the cleanup.
%c[orange]"Duty"\n%c[default]Experienced stalkers needed for a raid on Snorks. Payment is appropriate.
%c[orange]"Duty"\n%c[default]Experienced stalkers needed for a raid on mutants. Payment is appropriate.
%c[orange]"Duty"\n%c[default]Experienced stalkers needed for a raid on mutant spawn. Payment is appropriate.

%c[orange]"Duty"\n%c[default]Information about the appearance of an unknown group of snipers in the Unexplored Land has been confirmed. They kill everyone they see in the scope. Stalkers, mercenaries, Freedomers, and even Monoliths. Our squad also fell into an ambush and did not return. The snipers are well armed and equipped. It is not recommended to visit the Unexplored Land until we solve this problem. Soon we will clean out these bastards.

%c[orange]"Duty"
%c[default]Petrenko, answer me! What is going on with our private channel?! Is it down again?
%c[orange]Petrenko
%c[default]Sick of you. I don't handle communications, smartasses. When they fix it - they fix it.
%c[orange]Petrenko\n%c[default]Bullet, where is the data on the recon raid? Report, are there casualties in the squad?
%c[orange]Petrenko\n%c[default]We received several mortars. Checkpoint commanders - come to me urgently, to reinforce your defenses!
%c[orange]Petrenko\n%c[default]5th Squad! Nobody cancelled the raid for Arena monsters! Get out of the bar now! Do you want to go to the anarchists?!

%c[orange]Petrenko
%c[default]We received several decommissioned APCs. Fear, Freedom bastards! If you get lucky and wheedle a chopper from the military, our raid last year will seem like a sweet dream to you!
%c[orange]"Freedom"
%c[default]You scared a cat with a sausage! We have several APCs too! And we also have a tank at the base, stationary, true, but there are shells, and the turret turns. More than enough for your tin cans! And there are plenty of RPGs lying around somewhere.
%c[orange]Petrenko\n%c[default]We have temporary interruptions in the private channel operation, if anything happens - PM me.
%c[orange]Petrenko\n%c[default]We received a new batch of exoskeletons and weapons. All strike squad commanders - approach me to receive them.
%c[orange]Petrenko\n%c[default]I repeat, passage to the base is strictly by pass or my order.

%c[orange]Petrenko\n%c[default]For squads one through four! I repeat, only for squads one through four! Square thirteen, snail nine, map six - is closed until seventeen hundred hours tomorrow. High mutant activity expected.
%c[orange]Voronin\n%c[default]He who comes to us with a sword, will get hit in the face!

%c[orange]Voronin
%c[default]All squads report in urgently!
%c[orange]"Freedom"
%c[default]He-he, Duty screwed up somewhere again...
%c[orange]Voronin\n%c[default]All squads, report in immediately! General assembly on the channel!

%c[orange]Max%c[default] G4.
%c[orange]Skryaga%c[default] Miss. A6.
%c[orange]Max%c[default] Hit!
%c[orange]Lukash%c[default] Cut the crap! Losses at the Barrier again. Max, get the men up.

%c[orange]Belka
%c[default]Boar, I am Squirrel. Following you.
%c[orange]Kaban
%c[default]Squirrel, I am Boar. Why are you following me?
%c[orange]Belka
%c[default]Ferret's order.
%c[orange]Kaban
%c[default]Squirrel, didn't understand. Who is Ferret?
%c[orange]Belka
%c[default]Boar, you are a woodpecker, got it?!
%c[orange]Kaban
%c[default]Got it. I am Woodpecker. You are Squirrel. But who is Ferret - didn't understand.

%c[orange]Genka Brave
%c[default]I heard Cook has interesting magazines with girls...
%c[orange]Fedka Crumpled
%c[default]And Skryaga has tapes, they say...
%c[orange]Potap
%c[default]Listen here, guys: go to your subnet and chat there. Stop polluting the airwaves. By the way... does Cook really have something?
%c[orange]Cap\n%c[default]Lukash! We've been waiting for the Barrier relief shift for three days! We're sick of this...

%c[orange]Screw\n%c[default]We fixed the tracks on our tank after all! Now we can chase Dutyers or reinforce the Barrier! Wait, what do you mean there's no engine?! Drank it away?! Who?! Me?!!! To whom? What do you mean you don't know?! Damn! Cap, sorry, we'll have to manage on our own for now...
%c[orange]Screw\n%c[default]The best flame mixture is only at my place! For lovers of barbecue and fried bloodsuckers! Your money - our mix! Come to the Army Warehouses.

%c[orange]Cap\n%c[default]A mutant wave is coming from the north, requesting help, we can't handle it alone! Everyone who can provide fire support - hurry to the Barrier! If we survive - we'll settle up.

%c[orange]"Freedom"\n%c[default]Cool and buzzed peppers! Only in "Freedom" will you be appreciated and accepted as family! No obligations and ideological garbage, no morning reveilles and minimal prohibition! If you are a real stalker and love the free life among people like yourself - join our ranks! Joining time - anytime. We accept without breaks and weekends, daily and nightly!
%c[orange]"Freedom"\n%c[default]Veterans and rookies! If you value your freedom and want to be among friends - join our ranks! "Freedom" welcomes everyone led to us by the roads of the Zone!
%c[orange]"Freedom"\n%c[default]The Zone is stalkers. Stalkers are freedom. Be free to the end! Join "Freedom"!
%c[orange]"Freedom"\n%c[default]We are having equipment problems. Connection with the base and squads might be glitchy for a couple of days.

%c[orange]"Freedom"\n%c[default]Do you wish to meet new interesting people every day, wander in unexplored lands, feel the taste of true romance of life, spend nights under the starry sky? Go on a binge with us!
%c[orange]"Freedom"\n%c[default]Long live Freedom! Let's make the world better with the help of the Zone!
%c[orange]"Freedom"\n%c[default]Join Freedom! Let's stop the Zone's takeover!
%c[orange]"Freedom"\n%c[default]Only here! Boar on a spit, crow roast, omelet and all this with vodka and herring! Come visit our light!
%c[orange]"Freedom"\n%c[default]Experienced stalkers needed for an artifact raid. Treats are on us.
%c[orange]"Freedom"\n%c[default]Loners! Freedom speaking! If you want to live in normal conditions in the Zone and without army obligations like in Duty - move to us! Always glad to see new faces.
%c[orange]"Freedom"\n%c[default]All our guys - urgently log into the private channel, we are updating security. Don't complain later that "Duty" found out about your raid.
%c[orange]"Freedom"\n%c[default]If you are on a mission, all info goes to the private channel. Not only our guys read this one, don't blow your cover.
%c[orange]"Freedom"\n%c[default]Volunteers needed to defend the Barrier! Reward guaranteed. Contact Max or Cap.
%c[orange]"Freedom"\n%c[default]Send data on merc movements immediately to my private chat, this is really important.
%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]Don't clog the channel with nonsense. The fact that you saw a pack of dogs is, of course, wonderful, but it's not worth sharing joy about it - I will block access.
%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]Support the request for help with exact coordinates. It is in your interests - you won't have to wait while help combs the entire area.
%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]Put a couple of idiots on ignore. Sick of them.
%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]If I am not on the channel, it doesn't mean you can litter the airwaves.
%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]Using plugins on the channel is forbidden. Nobody cares what music you are listening to right now and what mood you are in.
%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]Disabled connection for certain comrades. They won't spout nonsense in the general channel henceforth.
%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]Don't be like the idiots screaming in the general channel for any reason. I'll take care of them.
%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]No reason - don't scream to the whole air. Use PM.
%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]I have small problems with equipment, and I may disappear sometimes.
%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]I repeat, the use of plugins is forbidden. Don't dump messages like "User is now listening..." and other crap here. The channel is not for this.

%c[orange]Squad
%c[default]Moving by bearing to the helicopter that crashed in the swamps. So far - no one.
%c[orange]"Duty"
%c[default]To the private channel, d-dammit!
%c[orange]Squad\n%c[default]Observing a mutant wave, coming from the northwest, coordinates attached.
%c[orange]Squad\n%c[default]Observing a mutant wave, coming from the northern ravine.
%c[orange]Squad\n%c[default]Observing a mutant wave, coming from the east, presumably - from the Dark Valley.
%c[orange]Squad\n%c[default]SOS! A pack of dogs is coming straight at us, exact coordinates attached!
%c[orange]Mertsayushchy\n%c[default]A pair of helicopters just passed over me heading north. Coordinates attached. Keep heads down, I don't know what their orders are.
%c[orange]Basti\n%c[default]We have to do something, we can't just sit and wait! It might be too late right now, but we are obliged to try! Turn it off already...
%c[orange]Basti\n%c[default]Recruiting a group for a breakthrough to the Radar! Need four people, preferably in exoskeletons and with good weaponry. I will supply psi-protection artifacts.
%c[orange]Kulinar\n%c[default]Alert! Spotted a pseudogiant at the entrance to Agroprom! Couldn't kill the beast, so, guys, be careful.

%c[orange]Yakut\n%c[default]Attention all! Observing migration of a large herd of pseudo-boars from Army Warehouses towards the Bar! Looks like a controller is leading them, but haven't seen the daddy himself yet. Somebody whistle to Duty, in case they miss this message.

%c[orange]Vasya Ninth\n%c[default]Attention, stalker Vovka Beetle! Give back the SVU, moron! I haven't zeroed the scope yet! You see, I didn't take your artifact, means I haven't finished tweaking the gun!

%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]Everyone! At Wild Territory took Grisha Baldy's PDA off a bandit, filled with unsent SOSs due to network overload. Sorry for the guy. People, don't clog the airwaves with garbage, you might end up in his place. To the especially dense ones I will block the PDA. Sidor, Barkeep and Four-eyes are also aware - they won't help.

%c[orange]Basti\n%c[default]Attention all! A helicopter without identification marks crashed into the Swamp, my PDA is catching SOS. The dead are crowding around, can't break through. Those willing to help - knock on my PM. Waiting at the Marble Oak, when approaching send me a message, otherwise fire to kill.
%c[orange]Baldy\n%c[default]Bandits have appeared in the Dark Valley again. Not good. We will be eradicating them.
%c[orange]Mole\n%c[default]Recruiting people for a raid into the catacombs.
%c[orange]Mole\n%c[default]Need two stalkers for a raid into the catacombs.
%c[orange]Syak\n%c[default]Need stalkers with experience raiding deep into the Zone. Payment is appropriate. Those interested - knock in PM, we'll discuss the meeting place.
%c[orange]Wolf\n%c[default]Fanatic, respond, need to talk.
%c[orange]Fanatic\n%c[default]Wolf, respond, need to talk.
%c[orange]Barkeep\n%c[default]So... Explaining once and for all - I will not say where the communication center is located.
%c[orange]Petrenko\n%c[default]I repeat, passage to the base is strictly by pass or my order.
%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]You are drawn to Him. But You are rude, deceitful, selfish. You are unworthy of Him! Only humility and obedience will give You what You want!
%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]The Zone is growing. You don't believe it? Look around! Don't you see? It is already inside You! Why go against yourself? Become its friend, not an enemy!
%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]He is a reflection of your fears and phobias. He sees and feels You. And He will find You - you cannot hide or run away.

%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]Nobody understands. Everyone wants to walk the path and get to the CNPP. Only it is a one-way trip. To pave the road to the Sarcophagus with blood and perish there - is that what you want?

%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]Everything has its term. Look back - there is emptiness. Look forward - there is horror and death. Why feel and see this? After all, you just need to change yourself, start feeling goodness from the Zone, so that all this stops...

%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]Only the worthy will receive happiness! Do you think that Blowouts are death to all living things? We know how to turn it to our advantage! Become Worthy! Receive Happiness!
%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]Are you afraid for your life? The Zone can give advice, help...
%c[orange]Advertisement\n%c[default]Stalker! Surprise your liver - drink water!
%c[orange]Advertisement\n%c[default]Always the freshest gear, guns and ammo! Direct supply from Duty warehouse. No middlemen. Dark Valley, ask for Zhila. Heh heh.

%c[orange]Advertisement\n%c[default]Old Russian fun: Order a fight! For birthdays, name days and funerals. Order a fight for a friend! Quality guarantee, on-site visit, video recording. Contact at: Dark Valley, Borov's base.
%c[orange]Advertisement\n%c[default]Stalkers! Visit the open-air 3D cinema "Brain Scorcher". Entrance is free.
%c[orange]Advertisement\n%c[default]Boar hooves, flesh eyes, thorn legs... none of this crap is in our vodka! Sidorovich's bunker. Open 24/7, no weekends.
%c[orange]Advertisement\n%c[default]Effective help in resolving any conflicts. Emergency humanitarian bombings. Agroprom Institute, military base.
%c[orange]Advertisement\n%c[default]We wash heads outside and inside, as well as shave and cut hair in the "Monolith" salon. Located in the Sarcophagus, third corridor.

%c[orange]Advertisement\n%c[default]Are your teeth falling out? Bones aching? Joints twisting? Tell us where the money and the rest of the loot is, and it will all end immediately! Dark Valley, bandit base.
%c[orange]Advertisement\n%c[default]I cure constipation. Quickly and efficiently. Diaper as a gift. Contact at: Agroprom Institute underground, controller.

%c[orange]Advertisement\n%c[default]Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant is hiring personnel. Training and internship at the employer's expense in the best Brain Scorcher laboratory! We make Your wishes come true!
%c[orange]Advertisement\n%c[default]I'm putting you on the counter. Geiger.
%c[orange]Advertisement\n%c[default]We conduct special operations of any kind. Fast, expensive, 100% result. Contact Mertsayushchy or Basti at Cordon, Rookie Village.
%c[orange]Advertisement\n%c[default]Buying machine guns of all types and modifications. Don't offer miniguns! Misha Machinegun.
%c[orange]Advertisement\n%c[default]Qualified doctor needed to work with Zone victims. Contact Shura Gynecologist.
%c[orange]Arni\n%c[default]First time in the Arena: zombie tightrope walkers, controller fakirs and tushkano sword swallowers! Hurry to see! With every performance there are fewer artists!
%c[orange]Arni\n%c[default]If you were hit on one cheek, turn the other - the jaw will pop back into place.
%c[orange]Barkeep\n%c[default]Remember: the only thing more harmful than vodka is its absence.
%c[orange]Barkeep\n%c[default]Stalkers! A postman arrived from beyond the Perimeter. Whoever wishes to send word to relatives, hurry stomp to the "100 Rads" bar.

%c[orange]Barkeep\n%c[default]I want to remind everyone again: whoever finds old music recordings on any media - bring them to me. I don't promise money, but we will play what you bring. If quality allows.

%c[orange]Barkeep\n%c[default]Today, on the occasion of stalker Sanek Jew's birthday, there will be tasty food and strong drinks! Fried potatoes, boar chops, flesh kharcho, Baileys liqueur, Baltika beer, "Buratino" vodka and much more! Gathering in the Bar. Offer is not free and limited!

%c[orange]Barkeep\n%c[default]Today, on the occasion of stalker Misha Machinegun returning from a long raid, there will be a feast for the whole Bar! Pilaf, fried bloodsucker tentacles, boar cutlets, rotan jelly, Baileys liqueur, as well as various delicacies from the Big Land! Gather in the Bar tonight. The whole party is on the stalker!
%c[orange]Barkeep\n%c[default]Don't forget: the best remedy for all diseases is simple water. Two drops of water per glass of alcohol, and it takes it all away.
%c[orange]Cook\n%c[default]If you don't treat a hangover - it passes in a day. If you treat it - in 24 hours.
%c[orange]Cook\n%c[default]In terms of price/quality ratio, free vodka has no competitors.
%c[orange]Cook\n%c[default]Snack on something nutritious with vodka. For example, beer.

%c[orange]Cook
%c[default]Sometimes life is so bleak,
That even tea won't go down the throat.
Only beer goes down,
With which you chase the vodka.
%c[orange]Cook\n%c[default]If there is no reason to drink - that is no reason not to drink.
%c[orange]Boatswain\n%c[default]When drinking, you need to know the limit. Otherwise you might drink less.
%c[orange]Boatswain\n%c[default]Actually I drink very little, only a hundred grams. But after a hundred grams another person wakes up inside me. And that guy, that bastard, drinks like a fish!
%c[orange]Boatswain\n%c[default]Red wine is good for health. And health is needed to drink vodka.
%c[orange]Max\n%c[default]Fight drunkenness, but before the fight you must have a drink.
%c[orange]Wolf\n%c[default]All rookies must come to me. I'll take a look at You, give some tips, throw some small jobs your way.
%c[orange]Guide\n%c[default]I don't promise vodka, but we'll have a great walk.
%c[orange]Doctor\n%c[default]Strelok hasn't been seen for a long time. Do you know where he is?
%c[orange]Zhila\n%c[default]Even in the worst person you can find something good, if you search him thoroughly.
%c[orange]Zhila\n%c[default]Buy. Sell. Profit.
%c[orange]Rat\n%c[default]When you look at Marked One with a knife, it's somehow hard to speak. A feeling that he might not listen to the end.
%c[orange]Syak\n%c[default]I had a wonderful dream today. Four loaders were carrying a pile of artifacts to me...
%c[orange]Yurik\n%c[default]At the Garbage near the abandoned vehicle lot ran into a pack of pseudodogs. Be careful there, don't step in it.
%c[orange]Sanek Bandit\n%c[default]A promise to return money in a week means only one thing - a request not to bother with this question for a week.
%c[orange]C-Consciousness\n%c[default]We do not know if it will be the end of the world, but the Zone is expanding, and we will monitor it...
%c[orange]Shadow of Monolith\n%c[default]Sometimes you really want to put a pistol to your temple. Feel so sick... But the prisoner covers himself from the barrel, begs not to shoot...

%c[orange]Mitka Caffeine
%c[default]Folks, anyone got coffee to spare?
%c[orange]Potap
%c[default]Are you crazy? What coffee?
%c[orange]Mitka Caffeine
%c[default]Well... Just in case... Maybe someone has it...
%c[orange]Ivan Scikun\n%c[default]Heard the news: someone wants to break through to the Scorcher again. Scary!

%c[orange]Sasha Ficus
%c[default]Found some junk, round. Beautiful, shimmering... Is it an artifact? Dimples are so smooth, fingers slide, cool... Ow, it lit up!
%c[orange]Network message
%c[default]Stalker died: Sasha Ficus, Cordon, Vortex.

%c[orange]Rafyk
%c[default]We solve your problems with competitors. Expensive. Ask Ara, yes? We'll be near the Bar.
%c[orange]Ara
%c[default]Hey, who was blabbering about me in the Bar? I find out, I stab, yes!
%c[orange]Gena Sapper\n%c[default]Buying mines, bombs, grenades, rockets. Selling damaged weapons, body armor, scrap metal. Not selling organs, get lost!
%c[orange]Gena Hamster\n%c[default]When there is plenty to choose from, there is usually nothing to carry it in.

%c[orange]Vasya Burnt\n%c[default]Buying the book "1000 ways to quit smoking". For any artifacts and loot. For offers contact: Radar, road to the Scorcher, checkpoint near gasoline barrels. Ask for Vasya Burnt.

%c[orange]Vlad Smely
%c[default]Dammit, zombie bastards! Wounded me badly at Yantar. I fought them off, but didn't manage to stop the bleeding... I see I don't have long left, even the scientists' medkit didn't help... And soon creatures from the Swamp will come to the smell of blood... Damn... Can't feel my legs anymore... Well, at least I'll do a good deed at last... To cleanse my soul at least a little... I trampled the Zone for three years, gathered a lot of valuables... Was planning to leave after this raid. Artifacts and dough there are enough for 20 years of comfortable existence on the Big Land... Arghhh... Made a stash in Pripyat, street... Message interrupted.
%c[orange]Network message
%c[default]Stalker died: Vlad Smely. Yantar. Extensive blood loss.

%c[orange]Gray\n%c[default]Mobile trader ready to deliver any goods to any point in the Zone. Flying out by helicopter, waiting time 1-2 hours. Any items from the Big Land. Prices bite, but the result and waiting time justify all means! Also buying any junk at moderate prices. Write orders in PM. I warn about my appearance over the Zone space via network so no one shoots at my chopper. Who wants to take a risk - prepare to meet large-caliber weaponry.
%c[orange]Sakharov\n%c[default]A personal request from me. If anyone is near my shelter and is not short on ammo, please, kill the Snorks in the swamps, they interfere with expeditions in this area!

%c[orange]Sakharov\n%c[default]Rookie stalkers! Scientists want to remind you that vodka will not provide such effectiveness in radiation protection as anti-radiation drugs. Remember: by saving a hundred rubles, you won't save your health!

%c[orange]Sakharov\n%c[default]After the recent Blowout, communication with the research group at Zaton was interrupted. For any information about the missing group, we are ready to provide a financial reward.

%c[orange]Sakharov\n%c[default]After the recent Blowout, communication with our group at Jupiter was interrupted. If you find any data carriers from this group, science is ready to pay generously for them.

%c[orange]Sakharov\n%c[default]Experienced stalkers needed to conduct various measurements and lead research groups. High pay, possibility of obtaining a legal pass to the Exclusion Zone. Contact our bunker at Yantar for an interview.

%c[orange]Sakharov\n%c[default]Colleague scientists and stalkers! We just discovered the disappearance of a test subject Snork from our laboratory. It was an adult and strong specimen. It will probably return to the swamp again. Be careful!

%c[orange]Sakharov%c[default] Kruglov, come to me. When are you going to take measurements?
%c[orange]Kruglov%c[default] I am here, Professor.
%c[orange]Sakharov%c[default] Are you slow?
%c[orange]Kruglov%c[default] Tomorrow.
%c[orange]Sakharov%c[default] And why not today?
%c[orange]Kruglov%c[default] You are slow yourself, Professor!

%c[orange]Stalker Petrov
%c[default]Dangerous mutants, anarchists and bandits will not stop "Duty", when Stalker Petrov is chasing "Duty"! Oh, respected "Duty", forgive me, it's my jubilee today, I relaxed... forgive me...
%c[orange]Petrenko
%c[default]Of course, we forgive. As soon as we find you - we forgive immediately.

%c[orange]Stalker Petrov
%c[default]Stalker Petrov in any condition views "Duty" as a priceless source of fats, carbohydrates and loot. What, didn't turn off the mic!... Well, I'm screwed...
%c[orange]Stalker Petrov
%c[default]Need an intermediary for trips to the Bar. I won't be able to go there myself anymore... payment - 20% of sold or gained loot plus payment for funeral and compensation to relatives if they figure me out. Won't offend. Look for me exclusively via SMS in PM, otherwise I won't respond. And won't say where I am, afraid of publicity and "Duty's" revenge. Petrenko, forgive me...
%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]Borov, stop calling Sidor an old goat on the channel. You're not young yourself, and your hooves are clacking - can hear it even here.

%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]Reminder: surfing porn sites from your PDAs and laptops is strictly forbidden - it clogs the channel heavily. And anyway - internet is not for this. This is the last warning. All malicious violators will be disconnected forever. And perish alone then, without the ability to call for help - your own fault.

%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]Alright, gentlemen stalkers. Information about a new squad of unknown affiliation has been confirmed. The network recorded an increased number of stalker deaths in various areas of the Zone. Whoever wants to live, I advise not to poke your nose anywhere further than the Bar without a support group. But even that gives you no guarantee. I spoke - you heard.
%c[orange]Sviblov\n%c[default]Freebie, scourge of marauders, where have you disappeared to? What about the goods? Tell it like it is, don't muddy the water, we only live once.
%c[orange]Sviblov\n%c[default]All squads, high alert, attacks on stalker camps in the Swamps have become more frequent.
%c[orange]Sidorovich\n%c[default]Who took a crap under my door again?!
%c[orange]Sidorovich\n%c[default]It is dangerous to live and be a trader nowadays. Need people to guard me and my savings.

%c[orange]Sidorovich\n%c[default]New promotion! With the simultaneous purchase of two Kalashs, eight hundred rounds for them, three Makarov pistols and six mags for each, as well as twelve antirads, eighteen medkits and seven grenades - you get a bandage absolutely free!
%c[orange]Kuznetsov\n%c[default]Sherstyuk, respond. The Doctor asked to convey - you have 5 years left maximum. He said you'd understand.
%c[orange]Kuznetsov\n%c[default]As my boss used to say, before entering somewhere, it is better to shoot, reload and shoot again, than to shine a flashlight and ask: "Who is there?"
%c[orange]Kuznetsov\n%c[default]Stalkers! The military always has one goal - a new target. Remember that.

%c[orange]Kuznetsov\n%c[default]Vodka is evil! Evil is the enemy! And a soldier does not fear the enemy - he destroys him! Private Pres... Perne... Pers-can't-pro-nounce-it-gulov! God gave you a surname... Listen to the combat order: start destroying the enemy!
%c[orange]Skryaga\n%c[default]Got hold of some toilet paper. Whoever is tired of burdocks - run here fast, the batch is limited.
%c[orange]Skryaga\n%c[default]My parents often beat the foolishness out of me, but I always knew where to get more.

%c[orange]Skryaga\n%c[default]Sidorovich, where is my order? It was supposed to arrive yesterday morning, and still nothing. If it doesn't come today, then, with all due respect, I will have to come and pluck the remaining hair from your head. I need this order very much.

%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]Is this your Zone? This is not a Zone, but some bullshit. And what's so scary here? I've seen worse beyond the Perimeter, and here we flew more than one kilometer and no sign of danger...\n...What is this! Oh, God, what was that? General, controls failed, we are losing altitude! General, did You see? Did You see?! Motherfucker!! Mommy!!! Save... Message interrupted.

%c[orange]Source unknown
%c[default]Gnome, get in touch urgently, there is business in Dead City.
%c[orange]Zhila
%c[default]Heh-heh, even a Gnome found work in the Zone. Looks like Snow White will show up soon too.
%c[orange]Kostya\n%c[default]Eh, we need a good comedian in the Zone. To tell some new jokes... Otherwise, it's all the same, nothing new.
%c[orange]Kostya\n%c[default]Just saw a guy carrying a sack of weed to the Freedom base. I think the faction will be out of order for three days.
%c[orange]Sakharov\n%c[default]Respected stalkers! Science is ready to accept any artifacts from you at the highest prices! We will pay well even for banal "Jellyfish". Visit our bunker at Yantar!
%c[orange]Petrenko\n%c[default]Buying samples of domestic military industrial complex, exoskeletons and gauss rifles! You won't sell for more anywhere else!
%c[orange]Skryaga\n%c[default]Buying any foreign guns at the best price! If you are at the Warehouses and with trophies - drop by the light!
%c[orange]Syak\n%c[default]Will purchase any quantity of military and scientific armored suits at a good price. Look for me at the Radar.

%c[orange]Adrenalin\n%c[default]People, heard about the suits of the elite Monolith troops? Well, the ones that are black? I am very interested in such things, so if you drag me such a specimen in any condition, I will buy it from you at a very high price. You will find me at Agroprom.
%c[orange]Sidorovich\n%c[default]Stalkers! If you whack a soldier and take his armor, bring it to me. I'll buy it at a good price. And bring artifacts too, so you don't have to walk twice!
%c[orange]Kostya\n%c[default]Borov, what are you doing? Your freaks stopped Dikiy at the Garbage, and he was coming from me, on business! In short - give back the player!
%c[orange]Doctor\n%c[default]A very smart dog went missing. Druzhok, if you are reading this ad, send an SMS urgently! I prepared very tasty bones for you!
%c[orange]Doctor\n%c[default]Friends, is it really that hard not to kill in the Zone? See an animal - go around, why take its life? They are alive, just like you! I beg You...
%c[orange]Borov\n%c[default]Do you like to assert yourself by humiliating and insulting other people? Do you hate people in principle? Join the Bandits! Bandits are the solution to all your problems!

%c[orange]Borov\n%c[default]Well, Dutyers, motherfuckers, are you done showing off? There was a squad, now it's gone, only one sharpened his sneakers, even a bullet didn't catch him. Heh-heh, by the way, that was Bullet, probably ran for help, or to cry into Voronin's vest, heh-heh. We will help your help, and help the help's help, for the boys' amusement, cause there's no need to stick your slippers into the Dark Valley!
%c[orange]Yuri Semetsky\n%c[default]My experience shows that usually others die.

%c[orange]Yuri Semetsky
%c[default]Damn, ran into some tailed-horned-scaly-clawed monster! 15 grenades from the underbarrel, and he doesn't care!
%c[orange]Network message
%c[default]Stalker died: Yuri Semetsky, Jupiter, deathclaw.

%c[orange]Yuri Semetsky
%c[default]Saw some guys in fancy exoskeletons at Jupiter today, had to hide away from sin, seems they didn't notice. So, whoever is going to Jupiter, then... Message interrupted.
%c[orange]Network message
%c[default]Stalker died: Yuri Semetsky, Jupiter, shot from unknown weapon.

%c[orange]Yuri Semetsky
%c[default]Today I reached Central Pripyat, went into a former kindergarten. Stumbled upon a room with the sign "Director". Hmm, such a sign is better than a dog, who would go there? Oops, the door is opening... Message interrupted.
%c[orange]Network message
%c[default]Stalker died: Yuri Semetsky, Central Pripyat, controller.
%c[orange]Lukash\n%c[default]Zubr, where did you dump the cargo? Do you have brains at all? Now stomp there yourself and pick it up, I'm not going to send guys to slaughter!
%c[orange]Lukash\n%c[default]Deception everywhere! Bought a bag of weed from the military, written: "One hundred grams free". I open it - and there is only weed!

%c[orange]Lukash\n%c[default]Cook, when will lunch be ready? Probably got drunk with someone again and sleeping, you cattle! Quickly grab your legs in your hands, turpentine on your butt and into the kitchen! If there is no lunch in 5 minutes - I'll tell a familiar controller to code you against drinking, moron!

%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]...wherever you go, every time you return to the same place. This damn fog... impossible to get used to... Chepurnoy disappeared, gone for good. Strange. Maybe he found a way out?..

%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]...Sixth day, water ran out... And the colonel went crazy: shot two and put a bullet in his forehead... I am alone now. Alone inside this freaking anomaly... And why did I have to cut off communications with HQ! They could have picked us up, huh? Pension, dacha, fishing - and there would be no ...static... And really, I wonder how it would have turned out? Ah, to hell with it. The Captain ...static... is dead a long time already... And ...static, noise... will go now, soon... to the upper tundra, damn it... to places rich in game... such is justice...

%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]... all this is, of course, clear, but don't you find that after the events at the CNPP many will want to know what the deal was. Especially Strelok with his team, loving to stick their nose where even a Burer hasn't looked. Damn, seems the channel opened... Message interrupted.
%c[orange]Anna\n%c[default]Uncles stalkers! Remember, there are no hopeless situations! There are situations, the exit from which does not suit you!
%c[orange]Kotobegemot\n%c[default]For a knife not to rust - it needs to be stored in a large piece of salo (fat).
%c[orange]Kotobegemot\n%c[default]Exchanging a 2x3 carpet for a piece of salo of the same size. Located in the Bar.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]The Zone teaches two things: to drink vodka regularly and to run fast.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]Intuition is the head's ability to smell with the butt. A very useful quality for every stalker.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]Fighting drunkenness by restricting access to vodka is the same as fighting diarrhea by restricting access to the toilet.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]Remember: a military chopper is not as scary as its drunken crew.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]Stalker, be careful. In the whirlwind of furious attacks, don't smash your face.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]If you help a stalker in trouble, he will definitely remember you when he gets into trouble again.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]The Zone is not chess... one checkmate is not enough here.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]The probability of failure is directly proportional to the stalker's self-confidence and inversely proportional to his experience.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]The art of going on raids for loot is defined by the ability to use the useless things you took instead of the useful things you forgot.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]Bravery, courage, justice - the first signs of alcohol intoxication.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]If you want it badly enough - you can fly into space. And if you delay too long - you might not make it to the toilet.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]Your loot not secured by reliable protection is someone else's loot.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]Rookie - remember: sleep with a rifle, eat with a rifle and go to the toilet with a rifle too!
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]Rookies! Carry grenades carefully - let them see you, not remember you.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]Don't forget that a mercenary differs from a neutral in that a mercenary will always tell you the truth to your face, but a neutral needs to be drunk first.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]Guys! I got a chunk of salo (fat) by chance, maybe someone has an onion? I hang out at Skadovsk.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]Sidor, you bald bastard, you slipped me a defective underbarrel grenade launcher! I shot, and the grenade fell on my foot. Good thing it didn't explode!
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]Half-asleep is when you look for your gear in the fridge. Hungover is when you find it there.

%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka
%c[default]And I am a Warrior alone in the field!
%c[orange]Proper Seventy
%c[default]Flooders - they are like mutants, dangerous and unpredictable...
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]Selling soul, buying liver. Waiting for those willing to trade at Skadovsk.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]Sponge Gop, sweatpants. If you see him - shoot him.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]A stalker is a friend, comrade to a stalker, and sometimes a backpack with interesting loot.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]He who doubts the peacefulness of mercenaries will wash with bloody tears!
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]A friend is not the one who drags you drunk out of the Bar, but the one who crawls beside you.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]Who has off-topic talk - approach. I dug up a brand new "Kord" here. Tried it on monsters, can't catch up, they scatter too fast.
%c[orange]Sherstyuk\n%c[default]Damn, tired of this vodka, but there is no alternative. Although, maybe someone has liqueur or cognac?
%c[orange]Sherstyuk\n%c[default]All troubles come from vodka. At best - from cognac. That's why I switched to pure alcohol.
%c[orange]Sherstyuk\n%c[default]A hungry soldier is scarier than a chimera. Brothers, don't steal food from the military!
%c[orange]Prapor\n%c[default]To everyone! Issuance of equipment and ammunition at the specified hours! Do I have to sleep here or what?!
%c[orange]Prapor\n%c[default]Ready to buy Flesh eyes for a good price! Come to the checkpoint at the Garbage.
%c[orange]Basti\n%c[default]The further into the forest, the more monsters there are.

%c[orange]Basti\n%c[default]Information about the appearance of a group of bandits in the Swamps using NVGs, thermal imagers and new generation infrared sights has been confirmed. Be careful, you might not see them through the swamp fog, but you are in full view for them. Based in the church and on the towers. Be more careful in the Swamps!

%c[orange]Mertsayushchy
%c[default]The network is lagging heavily... Sidor is probably downloading porn again. We'll send him a trojan now...
%c[orange]Sidorovich
%c[default]I'm not downloading anything, been sleeping for a long time, what's wrong with you? Where is the pause button here...
%c[orange]Mertsayushchy\n%c[default]Reminder: If I am not online - means I have an SVD in my hands...

%c[orange]Mertsayushchy\n%c[default]Reminding everyone! On the third, unknown persons hacked the network and stole dangerous and secret information! For the heads of these suicides I will pay the promised amount plus a camouflage exoskeleton!
%c[orange]Mertsayushchy\n%c[default]I repeat: the general channel is not for settling scores! All violators will be temporarily blocked!
%c[orange]Kruglov\n%c[default]I want to tell you, stalkers, that there is no perpetual motion machine in the world, but there are perpetual slowpokes.

%c[orange]Kruglov
%c[default]The thought came to me not immediately. The thought came to me not whole. Thoughts travel very long paths to me.
%c[orange]Potap
%c[default]True is true.

%c[orange]Kruglov
%c[default]Professor, gathered the info, the chopper arrived, moved out to You. Phew, thank god... There is a small forest, dark... And out of this darkness, in silence, these zombified are coming at us. About ten people, all in exoskeletons and with shotguns. Haven't run like that in a long time.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka
%c[default]When you get there - don't forget to wash your armor.

%c[orange]Wesker
%c[default]Mertsayushchy, when will you close the hole in the network? Sometimes the same messages come 2-3 times!
%c[orange]Mertsayushchy
%c[default]And what can I do? The Zone, dammit... It's like a digital echo effect. Can't find the cause.

%c[orange]Wesker
%c[default]Syak, when will you give me the "Goldfish"? You promised a week ago.
%c[orange]Syak
%c[default]Now is not the time to think about fish. Think about your soul. Kostya seems to have one, ask around.
%c[orange]Resident Evil\n%c[default]Thinking is always useful. And if you also do it wisely...
%c[orange]Resident Evil\n%c[default]And at Jupiter it rains. Dirt, slush, darkness and death all around. So good, mmm...
%c[orange]Resident Evil\n%c[default]Digging up a lot of loot is bravery, keeping it is wisdom, and skillfully hiding it is art.
%c[orange]Fenrir\n%c[default]Don't argue with a boor. Just smile softly and silently punch him in the face.
%c[orange]Fenrir\n%c[default]Warning: I am not the Ministry of Health - I won't warn you.
%c[orange]Fenrir\n%c[default]I am that kind of person - I don't hold grudges. I have to write them down.
%c[orange]Fenrir\n%c[default]If you can't fly - don't stain the asphalt.
%c[orange]Fenrir\n%c[default]Don't stand just anywhere - you'll get hit again.

%c[orange]Sasha Iter
%c[default]In the Zone there are three real traders: Skryaga, Petrenko, and Sakharov. All the rest are pathetic speculators. True, Sidor falls out of the general rule here: he is a trader who mainly deals with rookies...
%c[orange]Syak
%c[default]Need an experienced stalker to perform one delicate task. Paying double.
%c[orange]Adrenalin
%c[default]Paying triple and a good artifact.
%c[orange]Kulinar
%c[default]Whatever! Voron and I will chip in for a five-time rate! Just bring proof of completion. We'll discuss everything at the meeting.
%c[orange]Fenrir\n%c[default]Friends come and go. Enemies accumulate.
%c[orange]Fenrir\n%c[default]Nothing spoils the target like a direct hit.
%c[orange]Fenrir\n%c[default]Never hit a man when he's down, because he might get up and hit back. Just shoot him.
%c[orange]Fenrir\n%c[default]Don't spit in the well - there is an ammo dump there.

%c[orange]Fenrir\n%c[default]It is foolish to hope to achieve something global, for example, to establish world peace, to arrange happiness for everyone. But everyone can do some small deed, thanks to which the world will become at least a little better... For example, shoot some bad uncle.
%c[orange]Fenrir\n%c[default]CNPP-2 is my favorite place! There is so much stuff there...
%c[orange]Proper Seventy\n%c[default]Complex problems always have simple and easy-to-understand wrong solutions.
%c[orange]Arhara\n%c[default]If you can't complete the task - that's your problem. The diagnosis of encephalopathy has not been canceled by anyone yet.

%c[orange]Vityaz
%c[default]Kite, I am Knight. Do you copy? Over.
%c[orange]Korshun
%c[default]Knight, I am Kite. Standing near the object. Some strange interference. All equipment except the radio is completely out of order. Half an hour ago repelled an attack of monsters. Completely unknown monsters and... the rest later. We have casualties. Requesting immediate evac. Over... Message interrupted.

%c[orange]Vadim Shilo
%c[default]Help! Zombies pinned me down, can't hold them alone.
%c[orange]Gena Liquidator
%c[default]Send coordinates, soldier!
%c[orange]Vadim Shilo
%c[default]Gena... You?..
%c[orange]Gena Liquidator
%c[default]Shilo! Where are the coordinates? Shilo! Come in!..

%c[orange]Sasha Sivy
%c[default]Tolik, the boys are wondering... Is it true... Did you really play strip poker with Nimble?
%c[orange]Tolik
%c[default]Freaks, go to... Pripyat.
%c[orange]Sasha Sivy
%c[default]Ha! We can't get there without your pants!

%c[orange]Gena Liquidator
%c[default]Borov. Everything is done. Where should I put it?
%c[orange]Borov
%c[default]Don't put it anywhere. You already stained all the bags. 
%c[orange]Gena Liquidator
%c[default]As you say. Anything else?
%c[orange]Borov
%c[default]Of course. Check the stash.

%c[orange]Sasha Golden%c[default] Guys, a... scientist showed up here. Says he has info about a special place in the Zone. Says it's some kind of Eldorado. What is Eldorado, guys? And what's so special there?
%c[orange]Informer%c[default] Where did he get such info? Didn't say?
%c[orange]Voronin%c[default] Definitely a setup.
%c[orange]Skryaga%c[default] I heard about Klondike. About Eldorado - no. That's where there is unmeasured gold. Most likely it's not Eldorado, but Klondike itself.
%c[orange]Sasha Golden%c[default] Naah. He heard about Klondike too - we all heard about it - but this guy says there is also an Eldorado. Anyway, taking the contract. Thanks everyone.

%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]Aaaaaa! What is this?! Motherfucker, what IS THIS?!... Mommy, take me out of here!.. It's a dream... I am sleeping... none of this exists... it doesn't exist!.. No-o-o!!!

%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]Stalker! You bear scars and welts. These are traces of wounds received in battles. But it is also evidence that you are alive, and rewards for what you conquered and won! You live and fight because you want to someday stand before the One for whom you fought so much! And these scars, dear to your heart, will reveal Him to you! Come, He is waiting for you...

%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]Stalker. At the very moment you take your first step in the Zone, your Mind perceives the entire Path lying before you. And that distant Star that will not let you turn off this Path. And even if sometimes you have nowhere to sleep, sometimes nothing to eat, and dangers are all around - you, like any Chosen One, say in your Soul: "It's nothing. It's all part of the profession. Nobody forced me to go this way. I decided so myself." And therein lies all your Power! You chose your Road yourself! You have nothing to complain about! You have no one to complain to!

%c[orange]Source unknown
%c[default]Mayday! Mayday! Mayday! This is Echo Zero Nine! We got two packs in X-Ray One Zero! Request immediate evac! Alpha Zero One, Do you copy?
%c[orange]Source unknown
%c[default]Roger that, Echo Zero Nine. Negative to evac. Over.
%c[orange]Source unknown
%c[default]Alpha Zero One, Whiskey Tango Foxtrot! We are getting murdered down here! Need evac ASAP! Out!
%c[orange]Potap
%c[default]Mercs from abroad arrived again. What did they forget here?
%c[orange]Advertisement\n%c[default]Buying "Monolith". Expensive. Well, why not, nobody tried, maybe they will sell.
%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]And this pain again... Where else to look? He couldn't have lied...
%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]Have you never asked yourself: why do we spin around like this? To earn money? But what the hell do we need money for, if all we do is spin around?

%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]No matter how difficult the Path to the Goal is, there are always techniques and ways to overcome obstacles. But, already moving along the Path, you may realize that there are difficulties and obstacles that you did not take into account. If you wait for the most favorable moment, you will never move from the spot. And to take such a Step, sometimes a small modicum of Madness is needed. Put this Madness to your service! Do not be afraid! We are all mad to some degree. Just as our entire world is mad!

%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]Stalker! When the time comes to move to a new battlefield, cast your gaze upon all those you managed to befriend during your Path. Some you taught wisdom, others, on the contrary, taught you, to others you simply told various things, sitting by the fire. Your heart is full of sadness, but you know that you should obey the command of the One to whom you dedicated your struggle. Thank your companions for the company and boldly go further, taking with you unforgettable memories of the traveled segment of the Path...

%c[orange]Source unknown
%c[default]Attention! You are surrounded! Resistance is futile! Everyone lay down your weapons! Remove all artifacts from your belt! Deactivate exoskeletons and take off body armor! Come out with your hands up! I repeat...
%c[orange]Source unknown
%c[default]Lieutenant! You are on an open channel! Switch immediately!

%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]You have already experienced fear. You have already lied and betrayed in the past. You have already wandered not on your Path. You have already tormented yourself over mere trifles. You already had to say "yes" when you wanted to say "no". You already had to inflict wounds on those you loved... And you went through all this, but did not lose the Hope to become better than you were! Continue your Path...
%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]You are needed where you are right now. Only what is supposed to happen happens. Everything starts on time. And ends too.

%c[orange]Sidorovich
%c[default]Vasily, stop floundering. Accept everything as it is. Understand, it's not me, it's life. You seemed to settle well in the Swamps too. Why are you... arranging all sorts of sabotage for me here?
%c[orange]Vasily
%c[default]Life is made by people. I don't know what sabotage you are talking about. I haven't even come for your soul yet. But that hour will come... just wait.

%c[orange]Sidorovich
%c[default]A scientist from beyond the Perimeter showed up here. Says he's from a secret institute. True, his institute has such a funny name: NIICHAVO. What the hell? A setup?
%c[orange]Voronin
%c[default]Definitely a setup. It's from Strugatsky brothers. "Research Institute of Sorcery and Wizardry". What kind of magic is there in the Zone?
%c[orange]Lukash
%c[default]You are ignorant, General. It's the Research Institute of Chernobyl Anomalous Military Equipment. There was one before the first disaster. Terribly classified. And it seems to still exist somewhere underground. Either X-6 or X-4...

%c[orange]Sidorovich
%c[default]Freeman! Listen, help out! A guy showed up here. Only he is from America, your compatriot. Doesn't speak a word of Russian. Come, work as a translator, eh? If he says something useful - ten percent is yours.
%c[orange]Freeman
%c[default]No, Sidor. Me know how your ten percent ending! You look for other.

%c[orange]Gena Liquidator\n%c[default]Dudes, who read the latest orientation? A stalker nicknamed "Surovy" is wanted. I fought a chimera here, the bastard ate my PDA, had to get a new one. There seemed to be a six-figure number in the "Price per head" column, no?

%c[orange]Vadim Shilo%c[default] Gena, are you online?
%c[orange]Gena Liquidator%c[default] Shilo?! Alive?!!!
%c[orange]Vadim Shilo%c[default] Alive, alive. A controller knocked me out with a psi-strike back then, imagine! Apparently, that saved me. The zombies took me for a corpse. The guys died though... But the goods are safe and sound. Where to deliver now?
%c[orange]Gena Liquidator%c[default] Forget the damn goods! The main thing is you are alive! And I settled everything regarding the goods with the client. The deadlines have passed, they don't even need it anymore sort of. Well, had to persuade someone, I'm used to it. So keep the goods for yourself. It's yours.
%c[orange]Vadim Shilo%c[default] Thanks, Gena. Nice to hear that from you. Anything else?
%c[orange]Gena Liquidator%c[default] Yes, meeting at our place.

%c[orange]Zhenya Toadstool%c[default] Guys! Is it true they say there are artifacts that gift immortality?
%c[orange]Sakharov%c[default] They don't gift, they impart. And not immortality. Speaking in scientific language, they optimize biochemical reactions in the body by an order of magnitude, eliminate cell oxidation practically as a phenomenon, accelerate metabolism and do a lot more. That is according to rumors. I haven't seen them myself. You will age just like the rest of us, but much slower. You won't get younger. And how long you will live is unknown. Well, and it won't save you from violent death.
%c[orange]Zhenya Toadstool%c[default] Thanks, respected one. But are they in the Zone? Do they exist?
%c[orange]Sakharov%c[default] Well, according to rumors, sort of yes. Only where? If you see a stalker with an artifact unknown to you on his belt, ask him.
%c[orange]Zhenya Toadstool%c[default] Yeah. But who would tell? Everyone hides, saying it's for radiation, for rupture, for all sorts of other crap...
%c[orange]Ara\n%c[default]Make your order right now, and as a gift you get a PDA completely free!

%c[orange]Fanatic\n%c[default]Experienced stalkers needed to help crush bandits at the Cordon ATP. Also experienced stalkers who can hold this territory against counterattacks of the damn thugs. Wolf and I are planning to set up a transit base and a bar for rookies at the ATP territory. If everything works out - we'll even move Sidorovich there, there is a good bunker for him. Stalkers! Help us, and soon you will be able to not only sit by the fire at Cordon but also drink and eat well in the new bar! Plus, without fear of getting a bullet in the back from bandit scum. All willing - come to the Rookie Village next week.

%c[orange]Shura Gynecologist\n%c[default]Found a disfigured corpse in the Unexplored Land today. I've been trampling the Zone for four years, never seen such wounds. The whole body is like cut with a knife, only in straight continuous lines from crown to heels. Cuts are shallow but parallel, and the interval between them is less than a centimeter. The guy clearly died from pain or blood loss, internal organs not damaged, I declare this to you as a former doctor. A monster could hardly do it so precisely. Means it's either a new unknown anomaly or some maniac with good knowledge of the trade. I didn't wait for anyone, ran straight to the Bar to calm nerves with vodka. So look around more often.

%c[orange]Gena Mockingbird
%c[default]Look what I wandered into! What a loot, holy crap! How many of them are here? The whole field is covered...
%c[orange]Kolya Rusty
%c[default]Mockingbird, where are you? Why are you silent? Vitya, triangulate!
%c[orange]Network message
%c[default]Stalker died: Gena Mockingbird, Zaton, unknown anomaly.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]In the Zone, the straight path is not the shortest. The longer the road - the safer it is.
%c[orange]Grisha Honest\n%c[default]Trust no one. PDA stolen in the bar, bastards. What kind of people are these? What am I writing from now? Well, I nicked Barin's PDA while he went to the bathroom.

%c[orange]Gena Liquidator\n%c[default]Oh, Marked One, another orientation came for you. And do you know how much they are ready to shell out for you? Nah, I think I won't voice it. Who did you manage to annoy so much?

%c[orange]Vasya Monkey
%c[default]Syoma, do you hear me? I found such a fancy stash here...
%c[orange]Network message
%c[default]Stalker died: Vasya Monkey, Limansk, shot in the head.

%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]In the right ear they whisper to you: "you are weak, give me your hand, I will help you!" And in the left ear they whisper to you: "you are weak, give me your hand, I will save you!" Do you see the difference, stalker? So whose side are you on?

%c[orange]Mitya Burdock
%c[default]Guys, wow - a bush with eyes. Come, come here, pretty one... cutie... silly... poor thing...
%c[orange]Network message
%c[default]Stalker died: Mitya Burdock, Eastern Pripyat, Thorn.
%c[orange]Barkeep\n%c[default]Planning to open a canteen in one of the buildings in the Bar. Cooks and service personnel needed. Those interested come to "100 Rads" bar.
%c[orange]Sakharov\n%c[default]A rumor passed that there is a tunnel leading from the Bar to Yantar. Everyone possessing useful information on this matter can expect a generous reward.

%c[orange]Barkeep\n%c[default]Stalker, tired of sausage and canned meat, but you are not much of a cook? I can offer the book "100 Recipes from Barkeep", finest dishes from handy ingredients, price affordable, exchange possible.

%c[orange]Prapor%c[default] Kostya, woke up? Sobered up? Well what to say... you partied hard day before yesterday.
%c[orange]Kostya%c[default] And what is it, Comrade Warrant Officer? What happened? Don't remember anything... hic...
%c[orange]Prapor%c[default] Naturally, you don't remember. Day before yesterday you drank our entire winning from Lyuber all by yourself. Three bottles just like that. From the bottle! Then lined us all up under the barrel of your rifle and forced us to sing songs. Don't remember?
%c[orange]Kostya%c[default] Don't remember, Comrade Warrant...hic...Officer.
%c[orange]Prapor%c[default] Exactly... And then put Lyuber in a bent-over pose and forced him to crow like a rooster. And you don't remember that? Slapped his cheeks: sitting wrong, whistling wrong... And you don't remember that? Lyuber is still getting stitches at Doctor's.
%c[orange]Kostya%c[default] But what happened then?... hic...
%c[orange]Prapor %c[default] What happened, what happened... It was your birthday, dammit! If not for that, would we tolerate this? Even from you. Oh well. And at the end of all the fun a herd of bloodsuckers flew at the checkpoint. And you locked our guns in the chest in the wagon before that. Tried to shove the key into Bullet's... well, up there. Also don't remember? Oh well. But we enjoyed the spectacle from the wagon, how you beat up four bloodsuckers alone. Yeah... can't drink away talent.
%c[orange]Kostya%c[default] I want to apologize. To the guys. To everyone.
%c[orange]Max Lyuber%c[default] It's all good, Koshan. We drank well. Just don't forget, you promised me a small tame jumping pseudogiant for my birthday. A promise is a promise, everyone heard!

%c[orange]Professor Volkov
%c[default]What a view! Do you see, colleague? Do you see? My God, this is... This is... I even struggle to say what beast this is! Look at what... AAAAA!!!!
%c[orange]Network message
%c[default]Stalker died: Professor Volkov, Yantar, Thorn.

%c[orange]Professor Dmitriev
%c[default]Respected one, could we go faster? Would like to get there before dark.
%c[orange]Kruglov
%c[default]Professor, I've been walking this route for... many years, basically. You can't go fast here. Here it is... what is it called... distortion of space. Did I express myself correctly?
%c[orange]Professor Dmitriev
%c[default]How interesting! And did many scientists visit there before me?
%c[orange]Kruglov
%c[default]If we get there - you will be the first.
%c[orange]Professor Dmitriev
%c[default]First?! Wow! And what does "if we get there" mean?
%c[orange]Sedoy\n%c[default]Does anyone have a Maxim machine gun? Really want to remember my youth...

%c[orange]Khimik
%c[default]What w-w-was that?!
%c[orange]Prigorshnya
%c[default]Death... That was death. Well why are you lounging, get up! These are only flowers (the beginning)...

%c[default]Damn, seems something is wrong with my PDA. My messages are not sending.
%c[orange]Vitka Zozo
%c[default]Everything is fine, they are sending.
%c[orange]Sanka Zhmyev
%c[default]How do you know?

%c[orange]Zakhar
