%c[orange]Kruglov
%c[default]I wasn't planning to write anything.
%c[orange]Zakhar
%c[default]Kruglov, you...

%c[orange]Cook
%c[default]Happy anniversary, sidor! When is the booze-up?
%c[orange]Sidorovich
%c[default]With a capital letter, please!
%c[orange]Cook
%c[default]When is the Booze-up?

%c[orange]Sakharov%c[default] Kruglov, imagine - even poltergeists seem smarter than some people!
%c[orange]Kruglov%c[default] Umm, what are you hinting at?! Maybe let's conduct an experiment and find out?
%c[orange]Sakharov%c[default] Yes, of course! For this we will need a room, various objects or things and an indefinite amount of sweets.
%c[orange]Kruglov%c[default] I don't quite understand, Professor...
%c[orange]Sakharov%c[default] Well of course, You are not a poltergeist...

%c[orange]Romka Moose%c[default] Genka, are you busy tonight? The guys and I wanted to visit Cook, there is a worthy reason to drink.
%c[orange]Genka Frail%c[default] No, I am busy today! I am going to hunt the Deathclaw!
%c[orange]Romka Moose%c[default] Are you crazy? The Deathclaw doesn't exist! It's all tales of drunk veterans in the Bar!
%c[orange]Genka Frail%c[default] It's not tales! I will prove it to you today. I'll cut off his horn and bring it to you so you can see!
%c[orange]Romka Moose%c[default] Yeah right. Go ahead. And we will drink to your memory meanwhile.

%c[orange]Wesker
%c[default]Sanya Synoptic, send coordinates of the needed person to my PDA. Catch the encryption.
%c[orange]Sanya Synoptic
%c[default]Caught encryption, transmitted coordinates. Pay up at the meeting.
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka
%c[default]Wow! Turns out there is a weatherman in the Zone! Using the occasion, can I get tomorrow's weather?

%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]Information just arrived that an unknown group of stalkers, consisting of approximately five people, broke through the Monolith defenses at the CNPP and is moving along the station to the east. Also known that these guys took a lot of explosives with them. Targets and identities of stalkers not established yet. Request to everyone: if anyone knows anything about this group, write to me in PM urgently.
%c[orange]Borov\n%c[default]Sick of everything for real. And these flashy show-offs too: we are like stalkers, we are cool...

%c[orange]Vasya Tavern
%c[default]I hate the Zone. Hate mutants, hate bandits who strip you like a sticky note, hate anomalies, hate radiation, hate Blowouts, hate soldiers, hate hucksters. I hate my freaking life!
%c[orange]General channel
%c[default]Stalker died: Vasya Tavern, Dark Valley, bullet wound.

%c[orange]Shadow of Monolith\n%c[default]Infidels, repent! Your worthless attempts to penetrate our territory are meaningless and doomed to failure! Do not try to stop us on the path of spreading the power of the Great Monolith!

%c[orange]Dimon Clumsy%c[default] Guys! Anyone found a PDA? Looks like I drank too much at Freedom base yesterday and lost it, and I have important info there!
%c[orange]Freedom%c[default] With a cracked glass?
%c[orange]Dimon Clumsy%c[default] Yes.
%c[orange]Freedom%c[default] And a corner chewed on one side?
%c[orange]Dimon Clumsy%c[default] Yes! Yes! That's it!
%c[orange]Freedom%c[default] No, haven't found it.

%c[orange]Source undefined
%c[default]Test subjects demonstrate remarkable ingenuity. What do you think about this, Andrey Ilyich?
%c[orange]Source undefined
%c[default]Indeed, amusing behavior... Especially at such radiation doses... Stop! Switch to encrypted channel immediately! What the hell?!

%c[orange]Source undefined
%c[default]Candid, our equipment is acting strangely... All dosimeters and sensors are silent, and Sergey's PDA broke down... Connection is dying here too... What are the orders?
%c[orange]Source undefined
%c[default]Get out of there! Get out! Faster, dammit!

%c[orange]Source unknown
%c[default]Found the observation center?
%c[orange]Source unknown
%c[default]Yes, found it. Part of the equipment is still intact. Most cameras disabled, but motion sensors still working... Wait, there is a scheme with indication here... You are here, and... dammit, what is that?! Get out, a group of objects is moving towards you from northern corridors, very fast! Damn, more! In ventilation shafts... Message interrupted.

%c[orange]Source unknown
%c[default]Colonel, a helicopter with an experimental suppression unit crashed in the Radar area an hour ago. Immediately, I repeat, immediately send a group to the crash site. I don't care about the means. You will be provided with all necessary equipment.
%c[orange]Source unknown
%c[default]Turn on encryption, damn you! We'll be there in 12 hours.

%c[orange]Sakharov
%c[default]Respected stalker friends! We require a large amount of artifacts for research. We guarantee more than decent payment.
%c[orange]Sidorovich
%c[default]Respecte-ed!.. friends!.. Dressed up, eggheads? Brothers, who nursed you in the beginning, and revived you with vodka, huh? Your thick-headed science? Or Sidorovich? Bring all artifacts to me, as before!
%c[orange]Ara\n%c[default]Hey, who was calling me a chump there, huh? Like my uncle said... Measure seven times, stab once!
%c[orange]Serega Poet\n%c[default]Here lies a skeleton in the bush. The Zone is not a toilet for a stalker!

%c[orange]Max\n%c[default]So. Take a small plastic canister, cut it across into two equal halves and pour water into the bottom one. Then get a piece of foil somewhere, can be from a cigarette pack, and wrap the neck with it. Then... Dammit, I'm writing to the general channel! Message interrupted.

%c[orange]Vanya Ratcatcher%c[default] Sidor, do you like cheese?
%c[orange]Sidorovich%c[default] No.
%c[orange]Vanya Ratcatcher%c[default] Strange, such a rat, but doesn't like cheese...
%c[orange]Sidorovich%c[default] Are you crazy, stalker? Fell from the Pine-oak? You come to me to buy loot...

%c[orange]Lukash
%c[default]Cook, What are we gonna eat today?
%c[orange]Cook
%c[default]Nothing.
%c[orange]Lukash
%c[default]Yesterday was nothing too!
%c[orange]Cook
%c[default]I cooked for two days.
%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]Yesterday today was tomorrow. Repent, infidels, while there is still time! For tomorrow today will become yesterday.
%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]Everyone seeks their own Monolith in life.

%c[orange]Collector\n%c[default]To everyone who hears me... I am old and dying... time is short... two choppers... I shot them down... but... everything went wrong... I am the last... it was... prototype testing... very powerful... flamethrower... only three copies... one in my hands... whoever manages... pick it up... and also... a letter to my family... in the pocket... this is... a request... I... at Radar... seems... that's... it...
%c[orange]Sergey Shaggy\n%c[default]Trust no one. Hid from bandits in the attic, they shout to me: "come out, we won't touch you"... Well, I came out... And they promised...
%c[orange]Sashka Fighter\n%c[default]Hey! Anyone brave? To fight me in the Arena? Waiting for a serious opponent, tired of tearing rookies to shreds.
%c[orange]Peregar\n%c[default]All stalkers could be different if they weren't so identical. Because for us vodka or machine gun - as long as it knocks you off your feet.
%c[orange]Fenrir\n%c[default]Life is actually a very bad thing, and many small and commonplace things make it also very long.

%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]Kalinin's group exists at the ATP. Personnel 7 people. Weapons: SVD, "Vintorez", RPG. I consider using armored vehicles to destroy it inexpedient: terrain is flat - will get burned on approach. I propose to infiltrate this group to destroy from within with two of our agents under the guise of lone stalkers: Lieutenant Mikh...

%c[orange]Source unknown\n%c[default]Lukash, soon our squad will assault your base at Army Warehouses. Our commander is Lieutenant Colonel Cherepanov, recon commander. We will be based presumably near the farmstead. Where specifically - don't know yet. Hope you won't offend with payment.
%c[orange]Yuri Semetsky\n%c[default]When I stood by the Monolith yesterday, I thought that what is scary is not that I will die and then resurrect, what is scary is that I might like it.
%c[orange]Fenrir\n%c[default]Haste makes "Springboard" laugh.
%c[orange]Kotobegemot\n%c[default]Eh, would love some homemade salo right now! With fried potatoes...
%c[orange]Fenrir\n%c[default]There are many folks in the Zone, but few humans.

%c[orange]Kotobegemot\n%c[default]Ehh, damn, yesterday I had a desire to broadcast good news, but thought - I'll do it tomorrow. And today I don't remember what I wanted yesterday. Hmm, sclerosis is starting.\nDidn't consume alcohol yesterday.

%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]Stalkers, attention! A new type of zombie appeared. The most dangerous one. They crap and throw it at people. Okay on the suit. But radioactive stuff on the face is somehow unpleasant!
%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]Holy cow! Got my Viper wet today, had to dry it by the fire. How would I know the ammo inside would explode!

%c[orange]Sasha Girl:
%c[default]Going out to the Swamps. Such beauty... Anomalies jumping around.
%c[orange]Potap
%c[default]Today is a holiday for the girls, today there will be dancing.
Marauders, bastards...\n%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]We guess.
A pseudodog attacked, barely shot it!\n%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]Good job.
Saw a group of some random guys, presumably "Freedom", heading towards the Bar.\n%c[orange]"Freedom"\n%c[default]Don't blow cover, bastard...
A group of five people is moving towards the Barrier, presumably Monolith. Take measures.\n%c[orange]Barrier\n%c[default]Understood. Stoned fanatics, damn them...
Help! Military pinned us down at Agroprom in the central complex!\n%c[orange]"Duty"\n%c[default]Why can't you rest... we warned you, there will be a raid.
Lukash, mercs are shot, coming home.\n%c[orange]Lukash\n%c[default]To the private channel, idiots!
Two-three-seven, coming home, meet us.
Marauders pinned me down, help!\n%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]Attach coordinates, smartass.
Heard military comms, they are planning some operation at Yantar.

Lukash, "Duty" came to the farmstead again. Why?
%c[orange]Lukash
%c[default]Sick of them already. What do they need? They'll get it again...
%c[orange]Petrenko
%c[default]And those are not ours. Disobeyed direct order of General Voronin and flew out of the faction. So we don't care, do what you want with them.

Need internet access. Is there any in the bar, or do I have to drag myself to Sidorovich?\n%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]Seems Barkeep has it. In principle, you can try going to "Duty" signalmen, they definitely have access.
Coming from Yantar with important info, carrying wounded Ruslan Bomber! Guys, might not make it - I'm at the Railroad, and a foursome of mercs is on my tail, pinned at the transition to the Bar...

At the Garbage picked up SOS from Zhora Medic! Moving by bearing to Rostok, those willing to pull Zhora out - waiting for messages. Warning - Zhora was taken by the military, no less than ten of them, so it's gonna be hot.
To those wishing to purchase a PKM - I can help. Don't come to me with a merry company of more than one person, for I won't believe in good intentions and will shoot like mad dogs. I warned you...
Urgently buying four clips for a Gauss! Knock on PM!

In the Dark Valley, going by bearing to Kostyan Cat's alarm, ran into a couple of bloodsuckers! Whacked one, the second, bastard, went to the tunnel to Cordon. Warn the rookies there, I can't reach Sidorovich. By the way, Kostyan died, may the earth...

Attention all! A herd of zombies coming from Yantar, fuck them sideways. About twenty heads. Know for sure because ran into them myself, barely escaped. Or rather - sixteen now. Tried to lead them to mercenary position, but who knows, maybe they'll push to the Railroad...
Selling fresh Snotty Porcupine into good and caring hands. Can find me in the Bar. Will respond in person only after reply in PM. Presence of big money welcomed.

Attention all! Spotted mercenaries with heavy weapons in the southeast of Dark Valley! Moving to the Cordon. Those willing to rough up mercs - meeting at the Well, waiting until 3 PM. Without prior message to my PDA will shoot anyone, so for five hundred meters knock on PM.

Met the Swamp Doctor... Well, met... He healed me a little, from blind dog bites, but that's not important. Important is that he warned about a Blowout. Says Blowout will happen tomorrow, not in two days as per schedule, so everyone into holes tomorrow!
Was making way through military checkpoint at Cordon. Overheard negotiations. According to their forecasts, Blowout in 2 days. Prepare for long sorties so there are shelters on the way!
Heh-heh, Zhila, I drove a money client to you, get in touch urgently!
Need a stalker, specialist in combination locks, with experience raiding the north of the Zone.
I heard the Americans sent one of their supermen to us. Will be interesting to look at him.
Don't go into the basements, they are full of creatures! Go around on top!
Hemul, blow to the bar urgently, I have business!
People! Be careful in the village at the warehouses - there's Burnt Fuzz drifted onto the posts!
Hello, heroes, dammit! Stop trying to kick us out of the ATP! If any scumbag hasn't realized yet, this is our territory, and don't fuck with us!
Damn! Holy cow, it's full of zombies at Yantar again! Be careful there, people!\n%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]Unique information...
Stalkers! Sakharov gives good money for loot! And keeps looking for someone to send to X-16... I'm not risking it... It's highly radioactive there, plus zombies...
Attention! If in the village in the Dark Valley they offer you to buy some fancy rifle for 800 rubles - don't believe it, it's a scam!

People, don't be total jerks! Found someone's stash with weapons and olives (ammo) by accident? Fine, take it, since you got so lucky! But throw at least something in return! At least an old sawed-off, or a PM with a pack of ammo! Yesterday I was running from a pack of blind dogs, ammo running low. Decided to turn to a stash, replenish ammo. And someone had already dug there thoroughly, took everything. If not for a Duty squad passing nearby, dogs would be tearing me apart in the bushes. Don't be like bandit bastards! Remember, tomorrow you might be in my place.

People, if you are planning a trip to the Big Land, or returning from there through the military checkpoint - better rethink. Better crawl an extra kilometer in mud under barbed wire. Soldiers might take money for passage, and then detain "until clarification". And in particularly shitty circumstances might put you against the wall, or shoot in the back, or "forget" to warn about mines. Today I was supposed to meet Senka Valenok from the Big Land, he was carrying goods for me. So he paid, soldiers let him through, and then a burst at the legs and dragged him back. Saw it personally. Probably will pin "illegal entry" with all aggravating circumstances. And could have just whacked him...
Found a gun - called Drozd (Thrush). Now that's a beast! Eh, if I found one like that earlier - wouldn't be limping now...

Want to express gratitude for good humor on the general channel. Makes life in the Zone much easier. Sometimes it's very nice to read in the dead of night, somewhere in the Forgotten Forest, running from a pack of dogs, about storing a knife in a piece of salo.

A group appeared recently, called "Avengers". No different from bandits, except weapons and professionalism. Even wear trench coats like them. So if you see these freaks - shoot without hesitation, otherwise they will put an olive in your head themselves.

Old-timers probably remember the "Last Day" faction. There was one, good guys. And then some loner whacked their leader, and the faction vanished as if underground. For a long time nothing was heard of them, but recently I stumbled upon a group of guys in "Last Day" gear at Radar... In short, these are not the guys with whom you could not fear for your back, drink, and have a heart-to-heart. Opened fire to kill immediately, laid down two of my rookies. So if you see these scum - waste them immediately. Although, maybe it's just Monolith looting an old stash... But being on alert with them won't hurt anyway.
Dutyers! Saw a well-armed group of bandits near your outpost at the Garbage, coming from Dark Valley. Clearly not taking a stroll there.
Barkeep, that guy you ordered, I wasted him. But there were complications. Will you increase the reward?\n%c[orange]Barkeep\n%c[default]Come in, we'll sort it out.

Guys, heard that? They say Sidorovich decided to publish a newspaper - called "Zone Herald". And pays decently for news!\n%c[orange]Skryaga\n%c[default]Lying, aren't you? Sidorovich?! To someone?! Paying for such crap?! You are a dreamer!

Zhila, your grandmother over the knee! Where are you chilling again?!\n%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]Clear where: probably playing cards with bloodsuckers for suckers again. He has a dream - to latch onto Barkeep's cash register.
People, is it true that in the Zone someone manages to ride on pseudogiants along the roads?\n%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]No, not true. There are no roads in the Zone...

Ehh, received a beautiful suit from scientists today! With titanium inserts! A rat will shit itself from effort while gnawing such armor. And break teeth. And die from shame, because with broken teeth and all shitty.

So I met a deathclaw. What a monstrosity, mamma mia! And dies somewhat reluctantly. Was in Red Forest, near the stop where bloodsuckers always lived. Changing of the guard or what, heh. Where did he come from anyway? Thought they should only be at Jupiter.
Standing... Waiting... Surely someone snitched. Lekha, maybe forget it? Let's go tomorrow, eh?
Wow, what a scary monster I just saw! Horror!! Knees still shaking! Anyway, lads, do as you wish, but I now drink on days starting with "S": Saturday, Sunday and... Segodnya (Today)!
Eh, Vitalik... Stepped into Fruit Punch. I feel his legs, and there is only a kneecap. Lower, to the feet, legs are like a rubber stick, can tie them in a knot. Hope the doctor does something...

Guys, I have a toothache. There is no dentist in the Zone, as I understand. What to do?\n%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]Well, basically, there is one way. Come to the Bar around eleven, and down some anesthesia. And then throw a bottle at someone... should knock the tooth out.
Why did I drag myself here? I've been here only three days, and already lost my PM and walk around all beaten and tired! How do you live here??? Somebody!!! Lead me back out of the Zone!!!
However you plan, however you try - the Zone will always do everything differently. Will mess it up and won't ask your name, the bitch.
You should have seen this, such beauty! Gonna go clos... Message interrupted.
Semyon, coming out on your path, dragging Byvaly (Experienced), he got scorched by Zharka (Burner). Meet us, or we won't bring him alive!
Selling a crowbar. Behind "100 Rads" bar, in the evening.

Be careful with abandoned military equipment in the Zone! Soldiers, cunning bastards, can put a tripwire in such places that wouldn't occur to a normal stalker! Roma Crab crashed like that. I told him not to climb into that damn APC. But no, wanted to ride the Zone with a breeze! Started the engine, and as soon as he moved - something exploded, so hard that all wheels fell off the box. Little left of Roma, couldn't even bury him properly... Eh, gonna go drink, so he rests well. And he was such a careful stalker...
Misha Machinegun, did you do something crazy somewhere by chance? Cause people were asking about you here, asking all sorts of questions...
Syoma, I found Petrovich... Or rather, only his legs... At Radar, two steps from the barbed wire. Hit by a chopper or something, everything around is plowed up...
Yesterday my buddy and I drank two bottles of "Buratino" each and went hunting dogs. That's fun, I tell you! Only can't find the buddy... Will have a hangover cure now and go look again.
Recently saw a rookie who came to the Zone with a bicycle. Plans to ride around here on it, weirdo!
I heard here that Sakharov can get a Gauss rifle. Is it true, or are they lying?
Imagine, yesterday in Dark Valley found a 12.7mm casing. Wonder who is roaming here with such a gun?!

Brothers, I bought an awesome detector from Sakharov! Not cheap, of course, but marks anomalies! Yesterday was returning from the swamp at night in the dark, couldn't see anything, like a blind dog, and this thing saved me big time - got out alive and unharmed!

Brother stalkers! Sitting, looking at the Institute through binoculars - a new batch of military arrived! Combing everything here again, may the Zone eat them! Advise not to shine near Agroprom for a couple of days!
Discovered unknown mutants at the Wild Territory. Careful there.
Sold trophy guns to Sidorovich here... Seems he shortchanged me, the old fart... People! Better go to Barkeep!

Yesterday met my long missing partner, and he doesn't recognize me, started shooting at me! Had to shoot him... Damn, people, be careful with psi-emission! Shooting at your former colleagues is damn hard!
Rumor has it that a controller lives in the Agroprom underground, maybe even more than one... Stalkers, experienced guys went there yesterday - and didn't return! Seems it really is fishy there...
Yesterday at Yantar there was impenetrable fog - zombies barely visible through it... Don't repeat my mistakes - it is very dangerous there in the fog!
Heh! Time to quit drinking vodka, and go for artifacts. Who is with me?
At the Warehouses, where the mercenary outpost is, a corpse went missing. Killed four, but there are three bodies. Devices show three too. Where could he put... Message interrupted.
Some random loser is wandering in the Dark Valley. But his gun is cool. If anyone loots him - I'll buy that gun.
Was at the Warehouses, found a box full of medals for courage. Who were they going to award them to?
Who has "Tetris" - let me play for a couple of days.
Marauders, bastards - destroyed all of Pripyat... It's a pity, I grew up there...

Marble bloodsucker behaves interestingly - after being shot at, holds its side, like it's wounded...\n%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]And you offer it a medkit. You might just become the pack leader!
Found someone's pistol in a stash - killer thing, turned out to be. One shot - one kill.
Met a deathclaw after all. At night, in the Red Forest. Tell me, which puddle is less radioactive, to wash my pants?

Thanks, Mitya... You pulled me out... I heard you order me to lie down, but I was really scared. When it got hot, I completely lost my head. I am very afraid of pain... Damn, it hurts so much! Need to smear it with something. Zharka (Burner), damn it...
Beautiful twins appeared at the Cordon! Only they smoke, and girls shouldn't smoke!
...I am absolutely sure that in the vast majority of cases we are hammering nails with microscopes...\n%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]Shhh! Scientists are working, don't disturb.
Came to the Garbage, but Voron is not there. Tell me who he is drinking with, I need him very much.
Cigarettes ran out... What a day! Everything is wrong since morning!
No laughing! I am scared... The Zone is joking with me again. Walking at night, admiring the full moon. Yawned, closed eyes, open eyes - no moon! Cre-e-e-py!!

People! Maybe someone has fishing line and hooks by chance? I know there are no fish in the Zone, but was walking past a swamp just now, and really wanted to sit on the bank with a fishing rod... Would give a "Soul" for tackle...
E-e-e-h! Would love to ride a bike right now! Remember childhood! Does anyone know where to get one?\n%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]True words: the Zone will never run out of idiots...
Night descended... The Bloodsucker Village is already snoring mightily... But I am on alert with paper in hands... what if they noticed me after all?

Don't know, hic, who Budmo is, hic, but yesterday with Kotobegemot we drank so much for him... hic-hic.\n%c[orange]Mertsayushchy\n%c[default]I'll cut your PDA network for a day - you'll have time to find out.
Why was the anomaly "Sosnodub" (Pine-oak) named exactly that?\n%c[orange]Wesker\n%c[default]Because "Dubosos" (Oak-sucker) - doesn't sound very good.

Comrades, tell me, who upgrades the Pecheneg? Dolgovyazy refuses for some reason...\n%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]That's cause you boys don't know how to ask! You gotta do it like this: come to him, grab the Pecheneg by the barrel, and with the buttstock across the back - whack! He takes it immediately and even yells: - No need for an extra barrel, I already have one!
Fenrir, hello, brother. You alive there? Cause someone is walking around here, asking about you. I started to worry. Maybe give him... the ice hole treatment?
Went hunting fleshes here at night... And really none around. Apparently, hid in their holes.
Can teach how to properly show your heels (run away) in an unclear situation. Who is interested, waiting for SMS in PM.
Exchanging ten dog tails for one pseudodog tail. Offers in PM.
Lost a dog. Name: Professor Kruglov. Whoever meets him, don't kill. He is mine...
Pseudodog missing. Distinctive features: no ear, missing one eye, torn off paw, broken jaw and no tail. Don't shoot by accident. Answers to the name "Lucky". To the finder - a good artifact.
Eh, it's good when you and your comrades take down a pack of mutants! And excellent if on the first try!
Warehouses. Semi-ruined village. Walking, scared. The atmosphere here is wrong somehow...
Walking through the Zone for an hour, another, and I feel something is wrong. Fifth hour walking and suddenly I remember - where is the rifle? Daaamn, left it in the bar! Getting old, apparently.

Walking through the Zone for an hour, another, and I feel something is wrong. Fourth hour walking and suddenly I remember - where are the monsters? Haven't met a single one! Aaa, what the... Message interrupted.
People, I ask you from the bottom of my heart - don't shoot at fleshes immediately, take a closer look. After the second liter I look so much like them...
Seasoned stalkers say it's better to lose a beloved girlfriend than a bag of bolts. Remember this.

Kolyan, shoot, shoot already! Ptui damn it, got away. Call that a romantic: "runs beautifully, runs beautifully"! And now what: do I chase him beautifully across the whole zone? Oops, looks like I didn't turn off the microphone...
Big deal, a dog barked from under a bush, and he runs immediately. I would never abandon armor, let alone pants...
These bandits are proud! I send them gifts from the underbarrel, and nobody picks them up, everyone just scatters.
People, save me! I am at Yanov on the roof of one wagon, near the bridge. Ammo consists of two loaves of bread and two bottles of vodka. Not enough to kill myself...
Kitty-kitty, psst, psst. Come here, sweetie... Oh, crap, ugh, ugh bastard, shoo, shoo, oh-crap-crap, mommy!!!... Message interrupted.
Whoever forgot the path to Tuzla, knock on PM, I'll point the direction.
Zakhar, get in touch, have a topic for conversation regarding your order.

Serega, well where is your messenger? Did you send him through the fourth reactor or what? If the messenger isn't here in an hour, you can shove your package where a bloodsucker hasn't stuck its tentacles!

I have information that Duty lost its special forces squad in the Eastern Pripyat area. Moreover, from message fragments, it can be said they met some super-guys in super-gear. Contact with the squad was lost already in the third minute of battle, and the guys were super-pros, not some riffraff.

Borov, listen, we dug up an artifact yesterday, washed it down with the guys, and in the morning my nose is blue... I didn't understand for real, is it from the artifact or from vodka?\n%c[orange]Borov\n%c[default]Ask something like that again, idiot - and it will be from my boot.
Bubulyuka, say something funny, cause it's kinda boring!

Yesterday saw a flight of helicopters pass over Agroprom towards the Swamps. Circled near the path to Agroprom, then rushed to the bridge, where Tuzla is. And then suddenly lightning, crackling, howling, grinding, and a huge flash, like from a nuclear explosion. When I blinked it away - no helicopters, no military - nothing. And dead silence... Even deader than usual in the Zone. Thought about going there, to take a look, but it was getting towards evening, and a stroll in the Swamps is quite something... And now I sit and think - to hell with it! Other enthusiasts will be found, my skin is dearer to me.
Looking for a partner for a trip to Yantar and Agroprom. Loot split equally. Write in PM.
People! Can anyone lend some money for a week, about fifteen grand? Cards, damn them...
People! I really saw a skeletonized man in the forest! In an ushanka hat and with an axe! Seemed I didn't drink anything... There he is, f... Connection interrupted.

Hooray! Got hold of a Bengal Soul, can you imagine? A Soul!!! Wow, I'll live now! Get myself armor, a Vintar... And then on a raid again! Hmm... Will buy crap to climb into the deepest crap. Nah screw it, better send money to Mashka!\n%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]At least one is starting to get it...
Where is this blonde Carlson-trader? We had a deal! What kind of person is this...
Guys, help out. I pressed something on my PDA while drunk, something about ministry of defense here... Now it says - launch some rockets and a map of America. What do I press?
What the... Who nicked my loot at the Wild Territory, under the wagon wheel? Return it nicely, cause I'll find you anyway!

Max, need cigarettes? Dug up a whole box, Belomor!\n%c[orange]Max\n%c[default]Opa! Come on, come on, I'll take it all, bring it faster, don't stop anywhere, don't give to anyone, don't talk to anyone, RUN BRING IT!!!! Okay! Combat readiness! Moving out in threes to meet him, god forbid he wets the cigarettes!
That's it. Farewe...
Things are really bad for Khimik and Prigorshnya... Sold their armored car, begging, mostly on the outskirts. And what stalkers they were in the past! Did so many things!
People, has anyone seen Borland? Have business with him, for a good sum. Borland, if you are reading this message - respond in PM!
Who can give coordinates of Kombat and Topol? Have a small proposal for them, but they don't respond at all... Whoever sees them - tell them I was looking. Will be grateful!

Know about SBU special forces, called "Alpha"? Well, based on this special forces they created a unit specifically for work in the Zone. Real beasts! Eight people were walking with me to Agroprom, and these bastards attacked from ambush at the tunnel. Looks like I was the only one to escape, they laid down my partners there, at the fork... Armed and protected - very well! Clearly some top-secret military developments. So if you see such guys in the distance - run away. And if you see them close - pray. Now I'm afraid to even stick my nose out of the stash, they clearly don't leave witne... Message interrupted.

By the way, seen a lot of new exoskeletons appeared? With military, with Monolith, someone else too. Monolith guys don't even have an exoskeleton, but some kind of tank. Unloaded a whole clip from "Vintorez" into one - didn't care! Barely escaped, they run in this robe - very fast! Would be nice to get at least one like that... Although no, then anyone would want to unscrew your head for the suit. Forget it...
Is it true they say blind dogs don't bite Blind (Slepoy)? Or does he only know how to tell jokes about dutyers and conduct investigations?

Saw a group of zombie girls at Yantar. No, not those grannies who wheeze and call for "sooooony". Normal women, their suits are specially for women... Where did they come from? Fancy that, haven't seen a single live girl in the Zone, but zombie girls wander in groups! No, don't think anything like that... I satisfied them, like all other zombies - with a Kalash to the forehead. But still, where do they come from? Poor women...

By the way, people, seen Ugryumy (Gloomy)? Well, that guy who used to roam mostly on the outskirts, armed only with a PB and a sawed-off. Roamed for a very long time, sold loot to Barkeep, didn't get into any beefs, didn't shine anywhere. But one day he snapped and decided with his comrade, Skromny (Modest), and some four-eyes to rush to the Monolith. Don't know anything about Skromny, but saw Ugryumy recently at the warehouses, in the bloodsucker village. He was an unsociable guy anyway, but now he completely closed up, doesn't even drink with anyone. Don't know if he reached the Monolith, but the Zone changed him greatly... Since he joined Freedom, although previously didn't recognize factions at all.

The Zone is changing... Became much more dangerous than before. Remember, previously chimeras were only seen at the CNPP and in Pripyat, and now recently they whacked one such beast right at the Garbage. At Cordon they saw several bloodsuckers, a pair of giants and a group of zombies. And now, as paths opened from the Swamps, some unreal creatures are coming from there. Recently a pack of rotans attacked the rookie village. If not for Basti and his team, the dead would be countless. And if such crap is happening on the outskirts, what is happening in the northern regions? And at Zaton and Jupiter surroundings, where nothing is properly scouted yet? Must be unreal horror there! Screw it, better not go on long raids until everything settles down.

People, is it true that Slavka Bullfinch picked up some girl recently? Walks around now, coaching her, teaching wisdom. Seems she's from beyond the Perimeter. Will have to ask Sidor or Fanatic. Eh, would be nice to get at least a glimpse!

People, found a Niva at the Garbage, almost new and not radioactive! In joy rushed to Dark Valley, and got stuck there in the swamp under the bridge. Whoever can - help pull it out! Promise to give rides as reward, if it's on my way. Sitting in the hangar at the Garbage.
Looking for partners for a trip to Radar and Pripyat. Ammo and food on me. Located in the Bar.

In Dark Valley stumbled upon a large military detachment, about forty people. Well, sort of a detachment... Mostly, all soldiers were in pieces. Don't know who shredded them there, but clearly someone very serious. And no bodies except military were there. And even scavengers didn't have time to pull up... Anyway, looted only a couple of corpses, and as soon as dogs appeared on the horizon, bolted from there. Because such a mountain of meat will soon attract someone bigger than blind dogs, and I only have one life.
Looking for a partner for a raid in more or less safe places - Cordon, Garbage, Agroprom. Find me in the Rookie Village.
Looking for a heavy weapons group for trips to the Cave and Labyrinth. Will be at Agroprom near Adrenalin until tomorrow.

Looking for a partner for terrain reconnaissance in the Swamps. Wear lighter armor so as not to get stuck there. Guns for swamp wildlife on me. Until tomorrow hanging out in the Bar, then going to Agroprom.

People! Bandits captured my buddy Dimka Rezanoy (Cut)! Whoever can, help me rescue him! Misha Machinegun already replied, Oleg Rhubarb and Sanya Serviceman are coming from Cordon. Need a couple more people badly! Will wait at the farm in the south of Dark Valley until noon. As a reward will tell about a stash with good artifacts. Just hurry, otherwise bandits will stab Dimka!

Semyonich, look, another truck is coming from the center of the Zone! Meet it... Opa! No, no need to meet it anymore. Hit a Vortex, yeah. And debris flew into a Burner. No, no traces left... Damn, while I was crawling, the microphone turned on. Message interrupted.

The only ticket you can buy in the Zone is a one-way ticket. Remember this, and never look into the ticket offices of Pripyat! Such scum lives there sometimes that a bloodsucker will seem like a cutie.

Recently at the Swamps stumbled upon a semi-flooded dugout from World War II times. And guns there - countless! No, of course, mostly everything rusted, but about 10 weapon units - in perfect condition. 2 Mosin rifles, 3 Schmeissers, 1 PPSh and something else, I'm not very good with vintage weapons. If anyone wants to buy for their collection - write in PM. For an additional fee will give coordinates of this dugout. Maybe someone wants to dig in this old stuff.
People, who can suggest a good gun for 5.56 caliber? Cause I have money, not very good with guns, and the old M-16 is getting tired of being capricious.

Saw Swamp Doc today... Imagine what he did: sitting on rocks and sewing tentacles back onto a bloodsucker! The sucker grunts, but hardly twitches. Doctor, when he saw me - said I should stomp far away from here, since I have no health problems. No, well I can understand how Doc determined from a distance that I'm fine. Can even understand why he was sewing tentacles to the sucker - Zone old-timers have their quirks. But what fool managed to cut off tentacles from a bloodsucker while it lay unconscious?! And didn't make a control shot! And the sucker recovered, and when it woke up... That was a surprise. Probably like a cat that got... Well, those... sterilized, basically. And Doc really heals everyone.
Military are reinforcing their checkpoints. Something serious is coming, probably. Be more careful.

People, advise not to walk in Pripyat at night. Some rustling, moans, child's crying heard in the distance, ghosts in windows... Today entered a playground, and there are sounds as if children are playing... Swing squeaking, laughter... Don't remember how I got to the stash, ran like I never ran in my youth. And didn't drink or smoke anything before that... And it's not a controller, that one would just burn brains completely. That's it, I'm never setting foot in Pripyat again! This city is alive, I tell you for sure!
Monoliths are reinforcing their checkpoints. Probably waiting for someone tough. Be more careful.

People, from whom can I buy a silencer for a shotgun? Heard about such things, but never saw one. Like to work on beasts with large caliber guns, but loud shot sound is not always suitable. Approached Adrenalin - he doesn't have it. I have a Benelli. Paying with loot for information!

Rumor has it that somewhere in northern regions several transport choppers crashed. Don't know why they went there, but I have info that on one of the choppers were several crates with RPO-A (Flamethrowers). Where the info is from - don't even ask. Those places are untrodden, hardly anyone managed to dig in those crates. So whoever finds it first - good job! Don't thank for info, I'm not setting foot in northern regions anyway.

The fact that the Zone, mutants and all sorts of anomalies arose due to the military and scientists - everyone knows already. And whoever believes in aliens - is a total cretin. But that's not the point. The point is that these bastards continue to conduct experiments on the Zone and its spawns! Anomalous weapons, anomalous body armor, all sorts of other anomalous crap based on artifacts. And they conduct these experiments not in the Zone, but on the Big Land, in their best research institutes. Smell where I'm going? And if these assholes have something go wrong again, and we see a new Zone somewhere in Kiev, or Moscow? That's catastrophe! More people will die than when the Chernobyl Zone formed. And nothing can be done. These thick-headed eggheads never think about consequences...

Ummhmmwhen I was stiiiilll a huuuman, puttt didn't remembeeerr whaat didn't remembeeerr whereeeargh. Seeeemed liiike a treeee waaas, and a maaan sitting... Arghaaarrrr! Stttop, soooldier, sooooldier, ssstop... Message interrupted.
Found someone's stash - controllers pinned me down, can't fight off! Brothers, help out! Can find me in Central Pripyat. Part of the loot from the stash to whoever helps!
Thinking: I'll dump the loot, save up some cash and open my own business. Something Zone-themed. Souvenirs, maybe. Want to immortalize this place, this Zone brought so much grief to people.
People, tell me, where can one wash up in the Zone? Cause last week I washed my gear in a lake... and now it's not a lake there, but a swamp.
I don't like blind dogs. Bastards, they don't even look you in the eye.
Never buy meat pies from Barkeep. After all, it is the Zone. Normal dogs are not found here...
A good shooter is one whose gun speaks only on business! I do not submit to infidels! Only Monolith! Only HIM!
Heard there is an abandoned German bunker in the Forgotten Forest. True or are they lying?

Stumbled upon a wild cat lair today. Parents went hunting, and only kittens remained inside. I sort of forgot that it's not home around, but Pripyat, stuck my nose in there, wanted to feed them some sausage... So these kittens almost made sausage out of me! There were about twenty of them, didn't see them all in the dark. All pounced on me at once, and they weigh more than three kilos each! And climbing on me like on a tree, trying to claw at the face. I barely managed to close the SSP-99 visor. And their claws sure can't tear that suit! I was bashing them for a long time, cause they really restricted movement. Just as I quieted the last one - parents returned. Well, I blew the daddy's head off with the shotgun immediately, but the mommy got away. Will take revenge, what do you think? Seems like a dumb beast, but then again maybe not...
Does anyone know where Strelok went?
Ready to swear, five minutes ago at Cordon saw a crowd of mutants on the hill, two dozen, no less. Now - not a soul, not even any tracks left. And didn't seem to drink before going out...
Heard somewhere that a team of stalkers appeared, sort of gathering to go to the center of the Zone. Whoever knows any info about them - drop it in PM, want to join.
Fun stuff. On the way to Sidor, not far from the ATP, saw a bandit take a leak into an "Electro". Right in the forehead, eh... Not even coals remained.
People, do you hear these sounds? As if someone is about to atta... A-a-a! Get away! Get away, beast! Bitch! Hel... Message interrupted.
Thanks to the dummy who made a stash in the stove pipe at Cordon. The vodka was excellent!
Damn! These sleeping bags are so uncomfortable! Tomorrow going to express everything to Sidor!
Sidor, open up, bastard! You sold me damp ammo, misfire every second shot! Open up, or I'll take the door out!

Stumbled upon a corpse yesterday at Army Warehouses... Neutral stalker seemingly, nothing special. Only a skeleton left, clothes and things almost decomposed. And here is what's interesting: on his weapon was an inscription engraved: to such and such, for merits, year 2015. Hell knows, maybe they messed up the date?

Guys, I found an artifact here. A cobblestone is a cobblestone - nothing remarkable, doesn't radiate. However, glows a bit from inside and weighs almost nothing. What is this crap?\n%c[orange]Vasya Rusty\n%c[default]Exactly, crap. Where are you?
Who is this Semetsky guy? Sick of his messages already! Does he write them only to me? I meet him - I'll kick his ass!

Holy cow... Walking yesterday calmly at the Garbage, avoiding anomalies, and bam - like caught a concussion, stunned, eyes swimming... Well, I came to, look around - already at Army Warehouses. Checked PDA - only eight minutes passed! How is this possible?!
Anyone good with safes? Found one in the bushes. Rusty, true, but a grenade doesn't take it, bastard.
Visited Cordon today... Eh, what times come to mind... Nostalgia!

Guys, standing at Yantar right now, looking into the water... Shimmering, reflecting clouds, rays shining through there, among all sorts of garbage fry are peeking through... And the bottom. Pulls me to itself.\n%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]What's with you, brother, first time under psi-emission? Rays he says... Run from there!

Brothers! Yesterday near twilight was returning from a raid and stumbled upon some strange radio traffic... Some stalkers asking for help, saying they are stuck in an anomaly, can't get out... Has anyone heard of such a nightmare?

Brothers, who is recently from Cordon - how is Sidor there? Haven't heard about him for a long time.\n%c[orange]Sidorovich\n%c[default]What would happen to him, that huckster? Everything as usual - alive and well, ripping off rookies, pushing all sorts of junk to them... Nothing new...

Guitar broken, damn, to splinters and into the fire so it doesn't go out. Lost count already how long we are sitting here. Three of us, were walking from Army Warehouses, and then bam - and unclear where we are. Now can't get out. Wilderness all around, connection catches damn nothing, not a single soul. Tried to get out - walking as if in circles. And anyway... Message interrupted.
Brothers... Hel... [static] ... p... Stuck in ...geon ...rome... [static] ... g... broken, very as... Message interrupted.

Running recently through Pripyat, evening, dark already. Jump out from around the corner and bang my forehead into a zombie in a purple shirt. Then he growled something in a guttural voice, and I went completely cold and hair stood up on my head. Very scary.

Do you know which mutants are the most dangerous? You'll say, Venom or Deathclaw? Naah, not correct. I'll tell you. The most dangerous are flies and mosquitoes that plague zombies have! Capable of ruining even the coolest exoskeleton quickly, and how they drink blood, ooo, bloodsuckers smoke nervously on the sidelines!
Sanek, hello! I am near the Sarcophagus, and I am a Monolithian now, check it out! Entering the hangar now, I already see two guards... Hey, hello bros, glory to Monoli...

Shtyr, it's me. Listen to the scheme. Yesterday stumbled upon a dog lair at the Garbage behind the swamp, and a few zombies were hanging out nearby. Sat quietly on the side, dumped into general channel that I allegedly found a "Sleepy Ball" artifact and gave coordinates of the lair. In a couple of hours stalkers arrived, several people - and straight to the mutts. They shredded everyone, and zombies helped too, I finished off a couple of zombies and collected loot from the losers, not bad loot at all. Check out what I came up with!

Today met Gena Sapper with a mine taped to his leg with duct tape. Explained that he stepped on it by accident. Now walks around with it like that. What a laugh! If you meet the grief-sapper, don't get close to him - might blow up.

People, you won't believe it! Today saw through binoculars how military pinned some rookie down at Cordon. So he pulled out some artifact and started shooting through it from a PM. So from those shots military were thrown back ten meters. Wish I had such an artifact... And what is most interesting, didn't even search the corpses. Just moved somewhere to the Garbage...

Half an hour ago observed how a pseudogiant at Agroprom walked up to a "Vortex" and lay down near it. And it somehow immediately weakened. Grass around it straightened up. Apparently, he takes energy from it. So much for a dumb beast. Actually sucks anomalies dry. So, if you see a sleeping giant by an anomaly, better scram quietly.

Bandits have gone completely crazy. Yesterday a rookie came out of the hangar. Walked about 50 meters away. Bandits stopped him right there. Good thing he managed to send SOS to our guys. But still, by the time we ran up, they took all the loot and forced him to run between anomalies. Well, we shot them all. But this won't last long. In short, need to end them. And where do so many of them come from...

Today observed how a boar flew into some strange "Electro". So it flashes with all red lightning and strikes not to the sides, but straight up. I probed everything there with a bolt later and found nothing. And only charred remains left of the boar. And who knows where the anomaly went. Either crawled to another place, or dissipated. In general, be careful and keep a bolt ready.
People! Who knows, suggest how best to treat holes from "Electro" electric arrows? For an effective method will gift a slightly worn Berill-5M.
Urgently buying "Nut" artifact. Paying expensively. Find me in Dead City.

Wow, so many beasts bred in the Forgotten Forest! Wanted to go for artifacts with the boys, so many beasts were at the entrance that used up all ammo. Didn't dare go further. But at least harvested from the carcasses, cut off hooves and other parts.
Is it true that a Death Truck flew into an anomaly at Cordon? They say there are even survivors... Who knows, share info. Painfully interesting.

Today two of us were walking through Dark Valley and ran into a bandit in a jacket. Only the pistol didn't penetrate him. Had to shoot buckshot. And only when I took the jacket off him, understood what the deal was. Underneath was another one just like it.
Was recently in Forgotten Forest and can't understand how Krest survives there alone? Tons of beasts, and he is alone!
Today found someone's stash. And in it some strange ammo - called "Isomorph". Who knows what kind of thing this is?
Wonder if anyone in the Zone can attach a grenade launcher to a PPSh? Cause I like it painfully much. And want a launcher too...

Heard about the stalker-controller? Guys in the Bar told me. A controller took a stalker by the brains, but didn't kill him, set a condition instead: will give you, says he, my ability - you will take Dutyers under control and bring them to me. Well, the stalk agreed, and who wouldn't? Otherwise... you understand. Such a stalker approaches a Duty checkpoint, asks for a smoke, and then bam - and no checkpoint! Although as for me, all these are ta... continuing now, wait a bit, someone is coming to me... ouch, head aches somewhat, will finish writing la...
Listen! Finding charred remains for the umpteenth time! Does someone have a flamethrower in the Zone?!

Wow, guys! Isomorphs are hardcore! Last round in the barrel was an isomorph. And it actually stopped that beast! Hands shaking until now. It really saved my life, brothers. Where to get more of these? Where do they make them at all?
People, I was drinking with a stalker here. So he said in all seriousness that there are talking wolves in the Zone. What kind of mutants are these? Or is he lying? Maybe hallucinated?
Dudes, where to get some fancy gun. And with a signature like. Well like a personalized one. Huh? Nephew is coming to the Zone soon, want to make a gift.
Anomaly capsules are the thing! Threw around yourself and can sleep calmly even in an open field. No bastard will sneak in! Well, if that bastard is not a human, of course.
Guys, what can be carried from here beyond the Perimeter? Well, to sell with profit.\n%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]You survive first. To the Perimeter.

Traders are evil. Always asking for some favor. Religion doesn't allow simply selling, or what? Don't need money anymore?
%c[orange]Sidorovich
%c[default]Did you understand yourself what you said? Actually, money is the real evil! Beyond the Perimeter they long replaced religion for people. They have only money in their heads there, nothing more important left in life! Just to saw off some dough somewhere, to buy a new trinket.
%c[orange]Borov
%c[default]That's it, Ostap got carried away. Speaking in verses...
%c[orange]Dimak
%c[default]He is right, no matter how you spin it. And hucksters in the Zone, by the way - and not only them, to be honest - are the most fair: to get something from them, you have to sweat. And how did you want it? Everything fair and square. But the reward can be such that no money would be enough to buy it. True, that is how you negotiate. Face-control, understand? So don't cast aspersions on our hucksters...
SOS! Help! Tushkanos pinned us down at Agroprom! Can't get out ourselves. Brothers, help urgently, otherwise all seven of us will lie here!!!
Found an interesting zombie about a month ago at Radar. I gave him canned food, and he tossed me some artifact. Only went there the other day and didn't find him. Sad...
Sakharov got arrogant! Brought him two "Jellyfish" and a "Droplet". And he says he won't buy them. Says he has plenty already! Old beetle...

By the way, about stashes: took one from a guy for a bottle and told him at the end: "what I find - half is yours". Found, split equally, approach him - and he doesn't want to take it... Forgot, probably.

We have no ammo, sitting with Edik on a large boulder. About 100 meters away noticed some man in a black raincoat, decided to move to him... Damn, while I was writing, he hacked Edik with an axe, I bolted and am sitting near a crashed helicopter. Urgent hel... Message interrupted.
Found out that Sidor gives out diapers. Took one just in case, it's free anyway. Thought, maybe it will be useful. Just walked into Forgotten Forest - was useful immediately.

Yea-ah... Not the same wildlife in the Zone anymore... Walking just now from Bar to Garbage, look, a controller sitting under a tree. Legs stretched out, blissful face, warming in the sun - pure cat, just doesn't purr. Think I'll take a photo, since such luck! Approaching quietly, click - here he gets up, approaches so slowly - and bam, punches me in the nose! And grumbles: can't make out words, but clear he doesn't approve. While I was shaking my head, chasing redness from eyes, controller turned, walked away to bushes further and sat down again. Stood a bit more and went on. And you say - beast, beast...

Cook turns out to be a philosopher! Yesterday blurted out... such a thing! Think even Monolith prayer would be easier to figure out and understand the meaning than in what he said yesterday!\n%c[orange]Cook\n%c[default]Don't be offended, I was simply sober...
So, Messer, butt doesn't ache? Ha-ha-ha! That boar headbutted you nicely, flew a couple meters!

Rumor has it Monolithians are not such fanatics as they seem. Maybe they are just pumped with some drugs. Catch a bum on the Big Land, process him and send him here. And he defends his "Monolith". Just who needs all this? Hell understands, figures out... Or maybe it's all fiction...

A couple of days ago was in Limansk. And found some documents there. And in them written that there is some installation that affects people's consciousness. Not like Radar burns everything out, but specifically changes the mind. There you go! Maybe we walk under such too, just don't notice...

They say, a couple of weeks ago there was a breakthrough in the Cordon area. And rumor has it that mutants broke through to the Perimeter on some armored truck through the minefield. And a human was driving. Of course, many were laid down, but some broke out beyond the Perimeter and broke into the nearest village. So they destroyed that village to zero along with people. Eh, Zone, Zone. What are you doing...

A story happened to me today. In general, found an artifact. Such bluish, glows a little. Haven't seen such before and didn't have gloves on me. So decided to take it directly with a container, luckily no anomalies nearby. Put container on it, closed lid, and started moving container to myself. So artifact floated through it and stayed in place. No matter how much I struggled there, nothing came of it.
All military are dumb freaks!
Who is Semetsky? Why does he die constantly?
Damn! Sidor, bastard! Bought a new shotgun from him a week ago, and today it exploded right in hands. Good thing I stayed alive... Once I get to "Monolith" - will wish for Sidorovich to vanish!
Found a typewriter in a toilet yesterday. Wonder who is such a poet there?
Wonder if one can trade vodka for a BTR from Kuznetsov?
I want Sidor to have "Bumblebees" at the price of a diaper!
Fang! Haven't seen you for a long time. Since the moment you dragged me on yourself away from those black dogs. Want to say thank you and everything is fine with me.

Heard the other day Freedomers caught a controller and got him dead drunk. And were catching hallucinations all night... And then in the morning controller had a wild hangover. Had to shoot the poor guy, so he wouldn't suffer...
Is it true there are two labs on Radar? Painfully interesting, tell, who knows.
Attention everyone! Was in Pripyat, ran into Monolithians. And were in some strange suits, seemingly painfully fancy. Be careful.
Oh darn! Had a stash in Forgotten Forest. Came today, and there is a "Carousel". And what to do now?
Guys, found an old photo album in Limansk. Who is interested - write in PM, will discuss.
Hey, Kulinar! When will you invite for pilaf? Boasting so much, but still nothing...
Yesterday was in Forgotten Forest and found corpses of three vagrants. And what is most terrible, all three have heads torn off. Ghastly sight!
Wow! Today saw on Yantar how an exoskeleton walked by itself! Give a tooth, it was empty!
At Cordon on the farm three fleshes settled. Walk together. So together that it feels like they are a family.

Saw a group in Red Forest. They shot zombies and then started with friends, telling truth, not to drink vodka, but to booze.\n%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]Yeah we believe. What fool would drink vodka, when it can be boozed.
Went to Yantar. Beautiful landscape there. Small lake, hills, factory and zombies pressing. Idyll...
Stumbled upon a flesh today. So I kicked it in the eye! Died instantly. Looks like reached the brain.\n%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]You walk on stilettos or what?
Went to Garbage with the boys today. Just familiar hills appeared, and local dogs already greeting us.\n%c[orange]Stalker Bubulyuka\n%c[default]With bread and salt?

Damn! Filthy mutts, pinned me in a ravine and running around. One jumped, hovered for five seconds probably, until I shot its head. Heh-heh.\n%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]Dogs flying, probably means rain.

when i went out of roockie village i went to look for bloodsucker here i saw someone runing after boar and kil him i quietly sneaked up and shoot him in eye he jumped on me i barley got knife and stabed him and went to vilage to rest\n%c[orange]Potap\n%c[default]Let's stop smoking garbage. Otherwise cutting your channel.

Damn! Can't understand this Voron at all. He has some own anomalous philosophy. Brought him a SIG-modification - doesn't take it. Put in stash, came in a day or two - same thing. Turned out, it was slightly broken and had to spend a repair kit. And before the bag of weed was a normal man!
"Springboard"
"Burner"
"Vortex"
"Fruit Punch"
"Electro"
Shrapnel wound, apparently there was a heavy firefight
Boar
Dog
Pseudodog
Bloodsucker
Tushkanos
Not clear what happened, the guy was simply torn apart
Looks like a radiation burn
Slashed all over, don't know what beast that was
Head shot through
Arm torn off in one of the anomalies. Died due to blood loss
Terrible mess instead of legs. Seems stepped into "Fruit Punch"
Chest shot through
Shot in the heart, and then in the head - control shot. Mercenaries, apparently...
Bloody streak on concrete, shreds of suit, smashed PDA. That's all...
Someone was chasing him. Flew into an anomaly
Blood coming from nose and ears. Looks like consequences of radiation poisoning
No wounds. Very strange death
Hit a "Burner". Dropped PDA shortly before, otherwise I couldn't identify him
Splashed on the ground. "Fruit Punch"
He didn't even know what junk he carried in the backpack. Died of radiation. Radioactive artifacts
Suit intact, mess inside. Don't know what the matter is
Marauders
Ran into marauders
Leg shot through. Couldn't return to his own, died of blood loss
Guy pale as death. Neat through hole in the chest...
Damaged respiratory system, inhaled radioactive junk
Body thoroughly eaten. Looks like blind dogs
Everything here covered in some slimy junk. Disappeared without a trace, only found boiled PDA around the corner. Don't know what that was...
Leg slashed to the bone, died of blood loss
Open fracture. Couldn't leave, lay for a couple of hours, then something thoroughly ate him...
Shot at point-blank range from sawn-off. Apparently, it was a marauder ambush... bastards
Shot in the back of the head
Noticed a bloodsucker leaning over the body. When killed the beast and approached, guy wasn't breathing
Strange burns all over the body. Doesn't look like "Burner"...
Lacerated wound on chest. Don't know exact circumstances of death
Found PDA next to body. Don't know why voice recorder turned on, but nothing on recording except half an hour of screams. Not a scratch on the guy. Devilry...
Found slashed body. Knife lying nearby and trembling slightly. What was happening here, can't imagine...
Skeleton polished to shine in untouched gear. Rats?
Gnawed to bones. Rats
Both arms broken, neck twisted. Damn, who did him like that...
Smashed skull
Shoulder stitched with a burst. No bandages, died of blood loss
Yes Stalker, not your day today. Your bet didn't play... Your winning - zero tugriks.
Winning 500 rubles.
Winning one thousand rubles.
Winning 5 thousand rubles.
Winning 10 thousand rubles.
Winning 15 thousand rubles.
Winning 20 thousand rubles.
Winning 25 thousand rubles.
Winning 50 thousand rubles.
Winning 100 thousand rubles.
Winning 200 thousand rubles.
Winning 300 thousand rubles.
Winning 400 thousand rubles.
Winning 500 thousand rubles.
Jackpot Stalker! Your winning 1 million rubles.
Stalker, they were asking about you regarding the debt here...\nYou should drop by, pay the debt - only pennies left.
Ay-ya ya-yay, Stalker, the deadline has passed,\nand you are not rushing to pay the debt. Come on hurry up.
And what does this mean, Stalker? Were you given a deadline?\nGiven. Deadline passed - blow here with money.
So-so, Stalker, means we like to play, but not pay debts.\n Not good. Even contrary - bad. Need to tear arms off for this. Understood everything?

Strelok, you became totally insolent. Why the hell, asking, you are not bringing the debt?\nGuys came here, promised to cut you into a British flag, and feed the remains to fleshes. Come to me quickly.
I don't understand something, how did we agree?\nDebt for three days - and no "but I couldn't, sorry".\nDo what you want, but return the debt immediately. Otherwise - curtains for you.
Stalker, come to the Bar urgently.\nYou are awaited... with dough. Otherwise blame yourself - the axe is already sharpened.
You are such a beast, Stalker - you, bitch, are setting me up by not giving money back.\nIf you don't return the debt by evening - entrance to my shop will be closed to you forever.
Last Chinese warning to you, guy:\nall deadlines passed, and you didn't even lift a finger.\nYou are screwed now if you don't return the dough.
That's it, respected one - you are a corpse.\nI hired mercenaries. They are already looking for you.
